name: 2 Piece Grinders
description:
Custom 2-Piece Grinders Wholesale for Dispensaries & Brands

Embrace the power of simplicity, value, and unbeatable ROI with our wholesale 2-piece grinder collection. This category is the secret weapon for savvy cannabis marketers. Designed for dispensaries, cultivators, and brands seeking an efficient, affordable, and high-impact branding tool, the 2-piece grinder is a timeless staple that delivers results. Its no-fuss, "no-frills" design offers straightforward, reliable grinding in a compact, portable form factor that customers love for its simplicity. For your brand, it represents one of the lowest-cost, highest-visibility physical marketing items you can buy—a true gateway to building brand loyalty.

Our collection is curated for maximum B2B versatility, ensuring you have the perfect grinder for any campaign, budget, or brand identity. It includes the classic, premium-feeling 2-piece aluminum grinder, the sharp and efficient diamond edge grinder, the eco-conscious and story-driven biodegradable grinder, and the ultimate promotional item, the mini keychain grinder. Each one is a blank canvas, ready to be transformed with your custom branding.

Two-piece grinders are the undisputed champion of high-volume promotional giveaways, budget-friendly retail lines, and "gift with purchase" incentives. They are the ideal solution for on-the-go use, new customer "welcome kits," and creating a massive brand presence at events. Their compact, durable nature and extremely low price point deliver reliable performance and an unbeatable ROI, keeping your dispensary brand in your customer's daily routine, pocket, or bag for months and years to come.

Explore Our Wholesale 2-Piece Grinder Collection

  • Classic Aluminum Grinders: The durable, reliable workhorse with a premium feel. Made from a solid piece of high-grade aluminum, this grinder is lightweight yet virtually indestructible. Its sharp teeth provide a consistent grind every time. It's the perfect canvas for our precision laser engraving, which creates a permanent, premium-looking brand. Best of all, we often offer this model with *no minimum order quantity*, giving you ultimate flexibility.
  • Diamond Edge Grinders: Maximum efficiency at minimum cost. This style (often made from durable acrylic or plastic) features teeth cut in the classic "diamond" pattern. This design is prized for its sharp, efficient, and fluffy grind, which is ideal for rolling. These are incredibly cost-effective, lightweight, and offer a large, flat top that is perfect for a prominent, full-color, vibrant printed logo.
  • Biodegradable Grinders: The eco-friendly choice that tells a story. Show your brand's commitment to sustainability with our hemp-plastic or plant-based biodegradable grinders. These are fully functional, surprisingly durable, and send a powerful, positive marketing message. This item builds a "tribe" of like-minded consumers who will choose your brand because it shares their values.
  • Mini Keychain Grinders: The ultimate on-the-go promotional tool. This ultra-portable, 2-in-1 tool combines a surprisingly functional mini-grinder with a keychain. It is the definition of a "sticky" promotional item. It puts your brand on your customer's keys, guaranteeing a daily brand impression every time they leave the house. It's a walking billboard for the active, on-the-go lifestyle.

The 2-Piece Advantage: Perfect for Promotions & Portability

  • Unbeatable Cost-Effectiveness: Their simple two-part design means less material, less complexity, and a dramatically lower cost-per-unit at volume. This makes it the #1 choice for brands needing a high-volume, low-cost-per-impression promotional item. Putting a physical, useful, branded item in your customer's hand provides a far better ROI than a fleeting digital ad.
  • Ultimate Portability: Their slim, compact, and "puck-like" profile makes them the ideal "travel grinder." They slip easily into a pocket, purse, or backpack without the bulk of a multi-chamber grinder. This makes them a favorite for on-the-go customers, festival-goers, hikers, and concert attendees who value discretion and simplicity.
  • Simple, Reliable & Durable: This is a major selling point. With no extra chambers, there are no screens to clog, rip, or clean. With no multi-part threading, there are no threads to cross-thread or jam. It is the definition of reliable, analog technology. Just two pieces, a simple twist, and a perfect grind every time.
  • The Perfect Promotional Giveaway: The 2-piece grinder is the king of "Gift With Purchase" (GWP) incentives. A simple "Get a free branded grinder with any $50 purchase" is a proven strategy to increase average order value. They're also perfect for "Welcome to our loyalty program, here's a free gift" or as a high-volume giveaway at a tradeshow.
  • Versatile Custom Branding: We can match your brand's aesthetic perfectly. For our aluminum models, **Precision Laser Engraving** offers a permanent, high-end, and subtle finish. For our plastic and biodegradable models, **Full-Color UV Printing** allows for vibrant, eye-catching, edge-to-edge logos that make a bold statement.

Ready to get started with the ultimate promo grinder?

Let's get your brand in your customer's pocket. This is the most cost-effective way to build a physical connection with your audience. Click the button to request a free mockup, and our expert design team will show you how your logo looks on any of these high-value 2-piece grinders.

Request a Free Mockup Browse All Grinders

Frequently Asked Questions About 2-Piece Grinders

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for 2-piece grinders?
MOQs vary by model. Our aluminum grinders are so popular that we often offer them with **no minimum order quantity** for laser engraving. This gives you incredible flexibility. Our plastic, biodegradable, and printed models are produced in bulk, so they typically have a higher MOQ, starting around 100-250 units to ensure a cost-effective price.

What's the main difference between a 2-piece and a 4-piece grinder?
Simplicity vs. features. A **2-piece grinder** is just two halves (a lid and a base) with teeth. You grind your herb and then tap it out of the same chamber. It's simple, portable, and nothing is lost or screened out. A **4-piece grinder** has extra chambers: one to catch the ground herb and another (below a screen) to collect kief. The 2-piece is for simplicity and portability; the 4-piece is for kief collection and storage.

What are the biodegradable grinders made from?
Our biodegradable grinders are typically made from a hemp-based or plant-based bioplastic. They are designed to be 100% biodegradable and compostable over time, offering a guilt-free, sustainable option for the eco-conscious brand. They are a powerful marketing tool that shows your brand cares about the environment.

What are my customization options?
For our aluminum models, **Precision Laser Engraving** is the most popular choice. It creates a permanent, premium, one-color (silver) mark that will never fade or peel. For our plastic, acrylic, and biodegradable models, we use **Full-Color UV Printing** to apply a vibrant, multi-color, and durable logo directly to the surface.

Are 2-piece grinders effective?
Absolutely. They provide a very "hands-on" and reliable grind. Because there is no screen, the entire ground product (including all the kief) stays together, which many purists and flavor-chasers prefer. Their simple, tooth-on-tooth action is highly effective, and their simplicity is their biggest strength.

Is the branding (print or engraving) on these grinders durable?
Yes, this is a key focus for us. **Laser Engraving** (on metal) is permanent. It is physically etched into the grinder and will last the entire life of the product. **Full-Color UV Printing** (on plastic/acrylic) uses a special ink that is cured by UV light, creating a hardened, durable bond to the surface that is resistant to scratching, fading, and water.

name: 4 Piece Grinders
description:
Wholesale 4-Piece Grinders Collection | Premium Custom Grinders | MunchMakers

The Cornerstone of Your Premium Cannabis Merchandise Program

Welcome to our exclusive B2B collection of custom 4-piece grinders, the cornerstone of any serious cannabis merchandise program. Designed for dispensaries, brand managers, and retail buyers who demand excellence, these are not just accessories—they are high-margin, retail-ready products. If you're looking to elevate your brand beyond basic promos, our range of four-chamber grinders is the solution. Crafted with precision from premium materials, each grinder is engineered to provide a superior customer experience, which in turn builds loyalty to *your* brand.

A 4-piece grinder is a significant step up from a simple 2-piece. It offers a complete, high-value experience: efficient grinding, a storage chamber, and a kief catcher. For your customer, it's a "pro" tool. For your business, it's a premium product that justifies a higher price point and provides the perfect canvas for a premium unboxing experience. Let's build your brand, one perfect grind at a time.

Why B2B Buyers Choose Our Custom 4-Piece Grinders

Premium Materials that Justify a Premium Price

Our grinders are constructed from materials that customers can *feel*. Choose from lightweight, anodized aluminum, a hefty and substantial zinc alloy, clinical-grade solid stainless steel, or elegant genuine wood finishes. This robust build quality isn't just for durability; it provides a high-perceived value. A heavy, well-made grinder feels like a premium product, justifying its retail price and reinforcing your brand's commitment to quality.

A Full-Fledged Branding Tool, Not Just a Logo

This is your pocket-sized billboard. We offer extensive customization to create a personalized weed grinder that tells your brand's story. We go beyond a simple logo. Choose permanent, crisp laser engraving for a subtle, high-end look. Opt for vibrant, edge-to-edge full-color UV printing to turn the grinder into a piece of art. We can even do custom packaging. This is your opportunity to create a unique, covetable piece of merchandise.

Performance That Builds Customer Trust

A cheap grinder that jams or breaks reflects poorly on the brand that sold it. Our 4-piece grinders are built for performance, featuring sharp, diamond-cut teeth that shred herbs to a perfect, fluffy consistency. The multi-chamber design works flawlessly. When your customer loves their grinder, they trust *your* brand. You're not just selling an accessory; you're selling a reliable, enjoyable experience.

Wholesale Pricing for Healthy Retail Margins

We are a B2B partner. We understand that your goal is to build a successful retail program. Our custom grinders wholesale program is built on competitive, tiered pricing. This ensures you have healthy, high-profit margins on every unit you sell. Whether you're a single boutique dispensary or a multi-state operator (MSO), we provide exceptional quality at a price that makes sense for your bottom line.

Free Design Support & Fast Turnaround

Your time is valuable. Our process is simple and fast. Our dedicated customer service team includes professional designers who will provide a 100% free, no-obligation mockup for you to approve. We'll help you optimize your artwork and choose the best decoration method. Our efficient production process ensures a fast turnaround so you can get your products on your shelves, not stuck in "processing."

Explore Our Premium 4-Piece Grinder Collection

Our collection includes a style for every brand identity and price point. Each can be fully customized with your branding.

4-Piece Anodized Aluminum Grinder

The industry workhorse. Our top-selling grinder, crafted from high-grade anodized aluminum, offers the perfect balance of lightweight durability, performance, and value. It's the ideal canvas for crisp, clean laser engraving. This is the "must-have" staple for any dispensary's core merchandise line.

All-Over-Print Zinc Alloy Grinder

For brands that want to make a bold, full-color statement. The robust zinc alloy construction provides a satisfying, heavy "in-hand" feel. We use advanced printing technology to cover 100% of the grinder's surface with your seamless, eye-catching design. It's a functional and fashionable accessory that demands attention.

Non-Stick Ceramic Coated Grinder

The connoisseur's choice. Our ceramic grinders are designed for the stickiest of herbs. The 100% non-stick ceramic coating prevents residue buildup, ensuring a perfectly smooth, low-friction grind every time. This is a top-tier retail product that you can sell at a premium price point. Personalize it with laser engraving or high-adhesion printing.

Matte-Coated Grinder (The "Serene")

This grinder provides a sleek, modern, and "soft-touch" look and feel. The matte finish feels great in the hand, resists fingerprints, and provides the perfect backdrop for vibrant, full-color UV-printed custom designs. Available in multiple colors, this is a stylish and visually appealing choice.

Genuine Wood Grinder

Experience natural elegance. Perfect for the eco-conscious or "natural" brand, this grinder combines a beautiful, genuine wood exterior with a durable, anodized aluminum grinding chamber. It offers the best of both worlds—a rustic, natural aesthetic and superior modern performance.

The "PhatBoy XL" Extra Large Grinder

For the customer who needs more. Our PhatBoy XL is an extra large herb grinder designed to handle larger quantities with ease. Equipped with razor-sharp teeth and a spacious chamber, it's ideal for heavy-duty use or for group sessions. A great "pro" level upsell.

The "Titan" Solid Stainless Steel Grinder

Our most premium offering. The Titan is made from a solid block of clinical-grade stainless steel. This is a heavy-duty, "buy-it-for-life" grinder for those who demand the absolute best in durability and performance. It's a "halo" product that makes a powerful statement about your brand's quality.

The Retail Advantage: Why a 4-Piece Grinder is a Better Product

A 4-piece grinder is an essential tool for any serious cannabis consumer, and it's a superior retail product for your dispensary. Here's why it's a strategic upsell from a 2-piece:

  • Justifies a Higher Price Point: The added features (screen, chambers) create a higher perceived value, allowing you to price it as a premium-tier product, which leads to higher margins for you.
  • Efficient Grinding & Kief Collection: The bottom chamber collects fine pollen (kief). This is a major value-add for customers, allowing them to accumulate and use this potent byproduct. It's a feature that *sells itself*.
  • Storage & Convenience: The middle chamber holds the perfectly ground herbs, making it easy to access and use as needed. It's a clean, all-in-one "prep station."
  • The "Connoisseur" Experience: Offering 4-piece grinders shows that your brand understands cannabis culture and caters to knowledgeable consumers, building your credibility.

Ready to create your premium grinder line?

Let's build a product your customers will love and use for years. Click the button to request a free, no-obligation mockup and one of our branding specialists will help you select the perfect grinder and decoration method for your brand.

Request a Free Mockup Browse All Grinders

Frequently Asked Questions About Our Grinders

What Makes a 4-Piece Grinder Different from a 2-Piece?
A 4-piece grinder includes four components: the lid (with teeth), the grinding chamber (with teeth and holes), the storage chamber (which collects the ground herb), and the kief catcher (a fine mesh screen and a solid base). A 2-piece grinder is just the lid and grinding chamber. The 4-piece design is a complete system for grinding, storing, and collecting kief, making it a much higher-value product.

Are Your Grinders Suitable for All Types of Herbs?
Yes, our grinders are designed to handle a variety of herbs, including those that are particularly sticky or dense. For extremely sticky herbs, we highly recommend our Non-Stick Ceramic Coated Grinders. The sharp, diamond-cut teeth and durable construction make grinding effortless.

What's the best decoration method: laser engraving or UV printing?
It depends on your brand. **Laser Engraving** is best for a permanent, subtle, high-end "tone-on-tone" or "metal-on-color" look. It's indestructible. **Full-Color UV Printing** is best for bold, colorful, eye-catching logos or intricate artwork. It turns the grinder into a vibrant piece of art. Our team can help you decide (and provide mockups for both) for free.

What's the real difference between Aluminum, Zinc, and Stainless Steel?
It's all about perceived value and price point. **Aluminum** is the perfect balance: lightweight, durable, and cost-effective (our best-seller). **Zinc Alloy** is much heavier and denser, giving it a substantial, premium "in-hand" feel that justifies a higher price. **Stainless Steel** is the "luxury" option: it's clinical-grade, virtually indestructible, and very heavy, positioning it as a "buy-it-for-life" product at the top of the market.

Do You Offer Bulk Orders and Wholesale Pricing?
Yes, our entire business is built for this. We provide custom grinders wholesale options for businesses of all sizes, from a small dispensary's first order to a multi-state operator's large-scale production run. Contact us for a quote tailored to your volume.

How Do I Clean and Maintain My Grinder?
Regular cleaning is essential. Disassemble your grinder and use a soft brush to remove residue. For a deeper clean, soak the metal components (not wood!) in isopropyl alcohol, rinse thoroughly with hot water, and let them dry completely before reassembling. A clean grinder is a happy grinder.

Do You Ship Internationally?
Yes, we offer international shipping to ensure cannabis brands worldwide can access our premium custom grinders. Shipping times and costs may vary based on the destination.

Expand Your Smoking Accessories Collection

Create a full, cohesive merchandise line. By offering a full suite of high-quality accessories, you can elevate your brand and increase your average order value. Bundle your new grinders with:

  • Custom Rolling Trays - Keep your herb preparation organized and stylish.
  • Custom Stash Jars - Preserve the freshness of your herbs with airtight storage.
  • Custom Rolling Papers - Personalize the smoking experience from start to finish.
  • Custom Ashtrays - Add a touch of class to your sessions with our elegant ashtrays.

We're committed to providing not only top-notch products but also outstanding B2B service. If you have any questions about our grinders, customization options, or bulk orders, don't hesitate to reach out. Our knowledgeable team is here to assist you every step of the way.

name: Branded Packaging​
description:
Premium Custom Branded Packaging for Dispensaries & Cannabis Brands

Elevate your dispensary or cannabis brand from a product to an experience. In the competitive cannabis market, your packaging is the first handshake with your customer. We are a premier B2B partner for professional custom branded packaging, providing solutions that protect your products, ensure compliance, and powerfully promote your business. Our wholesale packaging solutions are designed specifically for the unique needs of cannabis retailers, dispensaries, extractors, cultivators, and brands who need reliable, beautiful, and customizable packaging that reinforces brand identity at every single customer touchpoint.

Your packaging is your most valuable marketing real estate. It's the silent salesman on the shelf. Whether you're operating a high-volume, multi-state operation (MSO) or building a boutique craft cannabis brand, our solutions provide the perfect finishing touch. Our catalog includes everything from custom grinder boxes and branded matchbooks to custom joint cases and child-resistant Mylar bags. Each item can be fully customized with your logo, artwork, brand story, QR codes, and compliance info to create a cohesive and unforgettable customer experience.

Explore Our Wholesale Packaging Categories

We are a true one-stop-shop for all your cannabis packaging needs. Our collection is built to serve every vertical of your business, from flower to edibles.

Custom Flower Packaging

How you present your flower defines its perceived quality. We offer a full suite of options:

  • Custom Mylar Bags: The industry standard, perfected. We offer child-resistant (CR) zip-tops, tamper-evident seals, and stunning, edge-to-edge full-color printing. Available in all common sizes (eighth, quarter, etc.) with matte, glossy, or soft-touch finishes.
  • Branded Glass Jars: Offer a premium, reusable option for your top-shelf flower. We can print directly on the glass or the lid to create a high-value, collectible item.
  • Custom Pre-Roll Packaging: Don't let your pre-rolls be an afterthought. We offer custom-printed joint cases (for single or multi-packs), custom-wrapped "doob tubes," and elegant cardboard "cigarette-style" boxes.

Custom Concentrate Packaging

Concentrates demand precise, high-quality, and often child-resistant packaging. We provide:

  • Branded Dab Jars: Glass, quartz, or silicone "puck" containers for shatter, wax, and rosin, with logos printed on the cap or side.
  • Custom Concentrate Boxes: Create a premium "unboxing" experience for your high-end concentrates with a custom-fitted box, often with a display window or foam insert.
  • Blister Packs: A professional and secure solution for single-dose concentrates or small vape cartridges.

Custom Vape & Cartridge Packaging

Vape carts are a high-volume, high-competition product. Stand out with professional packaging:

  • Custom Cartridge Boxes: The classic "tuck box" style, fully customizable with hanging tabs, internal inserts, and viewing windows.
  • Child-Resistant Tubes & Tins: Sleek, button-activated CR tubes and tins that are perfect for 510-thread cartridges and disposable pens.

Custom Edible Packaging

Food-grade, compliant, and beautiful. Our edible packaging solutions are built for freshness and safety:

  • Resealable Barrier Bags: Perfect for gummies, chocolates, and other small edibles. We offer child-resistant options to meet all state compliance regulations.
  • Custom Tins & Boxes: Create beautiful, reusable tins for mints or small confections. We also offer custom-printed boxes for items like chocolate bars.

Retail & Exit Bags

The final brand impression. Don't let your customer walk out with a blank bag. We offer custom-printed paper and reusable "exit" bags that comply with all regulations while promoting your brand all the way home.

Why Dispensaries & Brands Choose Our Packaging

We're more than a supplier; we're a strategic partner. Our program is built to support your growth.

  • Low Minimum Orders (MOQs): We're built for businesses of all sizes. Our low MOQs allow you to test new product lines, create seasonal or promotional designs, and manage your cash flow without being forced to buy a massive, costly inventory.
  • Aggressive Wholesale Pricing: Our B2B, tiered-pricing model means the more you scale, the more you save. We provide volume discounts for dispensaries and bulk B2B orders to ensure your margins remain healthy.
  • Full Customization & Free Design Support: This is our specialty. Add logos, QR codes, social media handles, compliance information, and your unique brand artwork. Our in-house design team is a free resource to help you navigate dielines, file formats, and design optimization.
  • Compliance & Child-Resistant Expertise: Navigating the patchwork of state regulations is a major challenge. We are experts in compliance and offer a wide range of certified child-resistant (CR) and tamper-evident solutions to keep you protected.
  • Fast Turnaround Times: We know the market moves fast. Our efficient production process allows for quick turnarounds, helping you hit deadlines for seasonal promotions, new product launches, and urgent restocks.
  • Retail-Ready Quality & Perceived Value: Our packaging feels as good as it looks. From the thickness of the card stock to the vibrancy of the print and the satisfying "click" of a CR closure, our products elevate your product's perceived value, justifying a premium price point.

Our solutions are perfect for creating stunning dispensary POS displays, high-margin branded product bundles, new customer promotional kits, and standardized packaging for wholesale distribution. Our custom packaging helps cannabis businesses of all sizes build brand equity, stand out in crowded markets, and ensure their products are presented safely, professionally, and beautifully.

Frequently Asked Questions about Custom Cannabis Packaging

Here are answers to our most common questions regarding our wholesale packaging program.

What are your minimum order quantities (MOQs) for custom packaging?
MOQs vary depending on the specific product and the complexity of the customization. However, we are famous for our low, flexible MOQs (starting as low as 100 units for many items). Our goal is to make professional custom packaging accessible to brands of all sizes, from startups to MSOs.

What is the typical turnaround time for a custom packaging order?
Our standard turnaround time is typically 3-5 weeks *after* you have approved your final design mockup. This includes production and shipping. We also offer rush services on many of our products if you have a tight deadline.

Can you help me with the design and compliance text on my packaging?
Absolutely. Our in-house design team is a free resource for our clients. We will provide you with the correct dielines (templates) for your product. You can place your artwork, and we can help you with the placement of compliance warnings, QR codes, and other required text. While we are not a law firm, we are experts in packaging best practices and can help you navigate common compliance features.

Do you offer certified child-resistant (CR) packaging options?
Yes. This is one of our specialties. We offer a wide range of certified child-resistant solutions, including Mylar bags, pop-top tubes, vape tins, and more. We can provide the compliance certificates for these products to ensure you are meeting all state and local regulations.

What kind of artwork file do I need to provide?
For the highest quality print, we always prefer vector files (.AI, .EPS, or .PDF). These files can be scaled to any size without losing clarity. If you only have a raster file (like a .JPG or .PNG), our design team can often work with it, but a high-resolution file is necessary to avoid a blurry or pixelated result.

description:
Wholesale Custom Grinders for Dispensaries & Cannabis Brands

Position your brand in the palm of your customer's hand—every single day. We are the premier B2B source for premium custom herb grinders wholesale, partnering with dispensaries, cannabis brands, and B2B distributors to create the most powerful marketing tool in the industry. A high-quality custom grinder is more than an accessory; it's a daily ritual, a walking billboard, and a physical "business card" that lasts for years.

Our extensive grinder collection is a testament to this philosophy. It includes the industry-standard 4-piece aluminum grinders, budget-friendly 2-piece grinders, hefty zinc grinders, and premium non-stick ceramic grinders. We also offer specialty finishes like matte grinders, elegant wood grinders, and high-tech electric grinders—all available with your full custom branding.

Whether you are stocking your dispensary retail floor, creating a high-margin branded merchandise line, or distributing products wholesale, our custom grinder program delivers. We provide exceptional quality with your logo, artwork, and full brand identity. From low-cost, budget-friendly promotional grinders to premium, retail-ready products that command high price points, we support every business model and growth strategy.

Explore Our Wholesale Grinder Collection

We've spent a decade curating a collection that covers every material, price point, and consumer preference. All are ready for your custom branding.

Custom 4-Piece Grinders (Aluminum & Zinc)

The "gold standard" for retail. The 4-piece grinder is what most consumers demand. It features a grinding chamber, a storage chamber with a screen, and a kief catcher at the bottom. Our anodized aluminum grinders are lightweight, durable, and perfect for crisp laser engraving. Our zinc alloy grinders offer a heavier, more substantial "in-hand" feel. Both are high-margin staples for any dispensary shelf.

Custom 2-Piece Grinders

Simplicity and value. The 2-piece grinder is a classic, durable, and highly effective tool. With no extra chambers or screens, it's easy to use and maintain. This simplicity, combined with its lower cost, makes it the *perfect* high-volume promotional giveaway for events, new customer "welcome kits," or as a budget-friendly retail option.

Custom Ceramic Coated Grinders

The premium, non-stick solution. Our ceramic grinders are a top-shelf item for connoisseurs. The 100% ceramic coating (no Teflon or PTFE) covers every surface, meaning plant matter doesn't stick. This ensures a smooth grind every time and a nearly self-cleaning experience. They look stunning, feel incredible, and justify a top-tier price point, making them one of our most popular high-margin items.

Custom Wood & Eco-Friendly Grinders

For the natural, eco-conscious brand. Our genuine wood grinders (often with aluminum-toothed interiors) offer a beautiful, natural, and classic aesthetic. They are perfect for brands that want to project an organic, sustainable, or "old-world" image. Laser engraving on wood creates a stunning, rustic "branded" look.

Custom Matte & Specialty Finishes

Stand out with a unique look and feel. Our custom matte grinders offer a sleek, modern, and fingerprint-resistant finish that's very popular. We can also source specialty finishes like iridescent "rainbow" or soft-touch rubberized coatings to create a truly unique product line.

Custom Electric Grinders

The high-tech, accessible option. Electric grinders appeal to the modern, tech-savvy consumer, as well as those who may have dexterity or mobility issues. Branding a high-tech item like this positions your company as innovative and inclusive, and it makes for an unforgettable high-value premium product.

Master-Level Customization: How We Brand Your Grinder

A great grinder is a blank canvas. We offer the industry's best customization methods to ensure your brand looks professional, permanent, and striking.

  • Precision Laser Engraving: This is our most popular method. The laser etches away the top layer (e.g., the colored anodization on an aluminum grinder) to reveal the raw metal underneath. It's permanent, sharp, and has a classic, premium feel.
  • Full-Color UV Printing: For brands with colorful, intricate, or photorealistic logos. Our UV printers bond a durable layer of ink directly to the grinder's surface. This allows for edge-to-edge printing, vibrant CMYK designs, and stunning visual impact.
  • PMS Color Matching: Want the grinder body to be in your exact brand color? We can do it. For larger orders, we can factory-paint or anodize grinders to match your precise PMS color code.
  • Custom Packaging: Complete the experience. We can package your custom grinder in a custom-printed grinder box, a velvet pouch, or a branded display case.

Your B2B Advantage: The MunchMakers Partnership

We're not a simple vendor; we're a B2B partner. Our entire program is structured to help you grow your brand and maximize your revenue.

  • Aggressive Wholesale Volume Pricing: Our B2B rates are tiered for bulk orders. The more you buy, the more you save, ensuring your margins are healthy.
  • Free Professional Design Support: Our in-house graphics team will create stunning, 100% free, no-obligation mockups for you. We'll help you optimize your logo and choose the best method.
  • Flexible MOQs (No Minimum on Select Items): We are famous for our flexibility. We offer **No Minimum Orders** on select, in-stock items, allowing you to test a product or design before committing to a large bulk order.
  • Unmatched Variety & Quality: Our 10-year relationship with our manufacturing partners ensures every grinder we ship—from a 2-piece zinc to a 4-piece ceramic—is high-quality, durable, and reliable.
  • Guaranteed High Profit Margins: By combining premium-quality products with our aggressive wholesale pricing, we give you the room to be successful. A custom-branded grinder has a high perceived value, allowing for excellent retail markups.

This program is ideal for dispensaries, head shops, cannabis brands (cultivators, extractors), promotional distributors, and online retailers. Our B2B grinder program is a proven way to build brand loyalty, increase average transaction values, and create memorable customer experiences through a product they'll use and love for years.

Frequently Asked Questions about Custom Grinders

Here are answers to our most common questions about our wholesale grinder program.

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for custom grinders?
MOQs vary by product. However, we are famous for our "No Minimum" program on select, in-stock grinders (like our most popular aluminum models). This allows you to order a single custom-engraved grinder to test it. For bulk orders, custom-color items, or UV printing, MOQs typically start around 100 units.

What's the difference between laser engraving and UV printing?
**Laser Engraving** is permanent and subtle. It etches your design *into* the grinder, creating a color-free "silver" (or metal) mark. It's best for a premium, durable, one-color look. **UV Printing** lays a layer of durable ink *on top* of the grinder. This is for full-color, vibrant logos and complex artwork. Both are extremely durable.

What's the turnaround time for a custom grinder order?
Our "No Minimum" laser-engraved orders often ship in as fast as 1-3 business days. For larger bulk orders or UV-printed items, our standard turnaround time is typically 3-5 weeks after you approve your final design mockup.

What's the difference between Aluminum, Zinc, and Ceramic grinders?
**Aluminum** is lightweight, durable, and cost-effective. It's the industry standard. **Zinc Alloy** is much heavier and denser, giving it a very substantial, high-quality "in-hand" feel. **Ceramic Coated** grinders are all about performance—the non-stick coating prevents resin buildup, making them a premium, easy-to-clean option.

I just have a logo. Can you help me with the design?
Absolutely. That is what our in-house design team is for. This service is 100% free. Just send us your logo (a vector file like .AI or .EPS is best, but a .PNG or .JPG will work), and our team will create a professional, free mockup for you to review and approve.

  • A Lighter for Every Goal & Budget: We've structured our collection for your business. Use our **Promotional Lighters** for low-cost, high-volume giveaways. Use our **Clipper Lighters** to connect with connoisseur culture. Use our **BIC Lighters** for universal brand trust. Use our **Metal Lighters** as a premium, high-margin retail upsell.

Frequently Asked Questions About Custom Lighters

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for custom lighters?

Our standard promotional lighters also have MOQs in the 300-500 range. Our premium metal lighters can often be laser-engraved with much lower MOQs.

What's the strategic difference between a BIC and a Clipper lighter?

Custom Rolling Papers Wholesale for Dispensaries & Cannabis Brands

The Ultimate High-Velocity, Low-Cost Branding Tool

This is your brand's business card that customers *pay you for*, *use every day*, and *share with their friends*. Rolling papers are a daily-use, consumable item. By putting your brand on the pack, you are ensuring your logo is in your customer's pocket, at their session, and top-of-mind every single time they think about consuming cannabis.

In a market with razor-thin margins on major brands like RAW or Zig-Zag, you are in a "war for loyalty." Stop sending your customers to Amazon or the smoke shop down the street. The most intelligent strategic move is to *own the product*. By creating your own line of custom-branded papers, you create an exclusive, high-margin product that customers can **only get from you**. This is how you build a powerful, recurring revenue loop.

Our collection is a complete, one-stop-shop solution for your brand. It includes everything from the classic king size & 1 1/4" rolling paper booklets to the ultimate convenience of pre-rolled cones in 3-packs. We also provide connoisseur add-ons like custom filter tips booklets and high-impact custom printed wraps—all ready to be fully customized with your brand.

Explore Our Complete Wholesale Rolling Paper & Cone Collection

We have a format for every customer type, allowing you to capture the entire market under your single, unified brand.

Custom Rolling Paper Booklets (King Size & 1 1/4")

This is the essential workhorse, the "bread and butter" of your paper program. The entire booklet (inside and out) is your canvas for full-color, edge-to-edge printing. We offer classic **Bleached (White)** paper or **Unbleached (Brown)** paper (made from 100% natural, unbleached fibers) to appeal to the "connoisseur" or "eco-conscious" consumer. This is your core, high-turnover retail product.

Custom Pre-Rolled Cones (3-Packs & 100-Count Boxes)

This is the "convenience king" and serves the fastest-growing market segment. Many modern consumers don't want to roll, or simply can't. The 3-Pack is the perfect high-margin, point-of-sale (POS) "impulse buy" or upsell. The 100-Count Box is the "at-home" stock-up item. This is the product that builds *extreme* customer loyalty, as your branded box sits on their shelf for weeks, reinforcing your brand with every single use. We can even print your logo on the cone's filter tip for maximum branding.

Magnetic Closure Booklets

This is your "premium upgrade." For a fractional increase in per-unit cost, you can add a small, embedded magnet to the booklet flap. The result is a high-perceived value product that *feels* 10x more expensive. The satisfying, tactile "snap" of the magnet protects the papers, keeps the booklet from getting mangled in a pocket, and makes your brand feel sophisticated and high-end. This is the perfect way to create a "top-shelf" version of your branded papers.

Custom Filter Tips Booklets

This is the connoisseur's add-on and the easiest upsell in your store. For customers who prefer a sturdier, cooler smoke, a branded filter tip booklet is an essential. You can sell them as a standalone, low-cost item or (even better) bundle them. "Buy a booklet of papers and get the matching filters for $1 more." It's a simple, high-margin strategy to increase your average order value (AOV).

Custom Printed Wraps (Printing *on* the Paper)

This is the ultimate "wow" factor for the hype-focused brand. Go beyond just the booklet and print your logo or a "step-and-repeat" pattern directly *on* the rolling paper itself. We use 100% safe, non-toxic, flavorless, soy-based ink. This is a head-turning, "Instagrammable" product that makes a massive statement. It's the perfect choice for limited-edition drops, artist collaborations, or creating a product that *will* get shared on social media, generating organic marketing for your brand.

The B2B Strategy: Why Custom Papers are a Smarter Investment

  • Build a Powerful, Recurring Revenue Loop This is the most important benefit. A grinder is a "durable good"—you sell it once. Papers are a "consumable good." They run out. When a customer loves *your* branded papers, they are **forced to return to your dispensary** to buy them again. This is the most powerful and reliable customer loyalty loop you can build, driving guaranteed, repeat foot traffic to your store.
  • Escape the Margin War & Control Your Price You cannot win a price war against Amazon or the smoke shop down the street on RAW or Zig-Zag. Those are commodity products with razor-thin margins. But *your* brand is an exclusive. By creating your own line of papers, you **own the product 100%**. You set the price, you are the only one who sells it, and you enjoy incredibly healthy profit margins.
  • A 360° Pocket-Sized Billboard The entire booklet—front, back, inside, and flap—is your canvas. It's a marketing piece that your customer pays *you* to carry. Don't just add your logo. Add your **QR code for your menu**. Add your **Instagram handle**. Add your **weekly specials, loyalty program info, or a new product drop announcement**. It's a dynamic, low-cost communication channel you own.
  • A Complete Solution for Every Customer Type Our collection allows you to satisfy *every* customer under *your* single, unified brand umbrella. You'll have the 1 1/4" booklet for the solo roller, the King Size for the social smoker, the cones for the convenience-seeker, and the filter tips for the connoisseur. You become the one-stop-shop, and it's all your brand.
  • Low Minimums & Free Professional Design You don't need a $20,000 budget to get started. Our program is built for B2B flexibility, with low minimum order quantities that allow you to test a new design without a massive cash outlay. Our in-house, professional design team is a **free resource** to you. We will take your logo and assets and create a stunning, print-ready, professional mockup for you to approve.

Ready to create your brand's most powerful loyalty tool?

Let's get your brand on this essential, high-velocity product. This is the smartest merchandising decision you can make. Click the button to request a free, no-obligation mockup and our design team will create a stunning, print-ready design for your own line of rolling papers.

Because rolling papers are a high-volume item that requires custom printing plates and factory setup, the MOQ is typically higher than for other accessories. MOQs generally start in the **1,000 to 2,500 booklet range**. This high volume is what allows us to provide the lowest possible cost-per-unit, making your retail margins incredibly healthy.

Our standard turnaround time for custom rolling papers, which includes full-color printing, manufacturing, and shipping, is typically **4-6 weeks** *after* you have approved your final digital mockup. We recommend planning your 4/20 or seasonal orders in advance.

We offer all the industry standards. **Bleached (White)** paper is the classic, clean-burning rice or wood pulp paper many are used to. It's a great canvas. **Unbleached (Brown)** paper is the "connoisseur" choice, made from 100% natural, unbleached hemp or wood fibers. It's perfect for an eco-conscious, "organic" brand. We also offer options like pure **Hemp** paper. All are slow-burning and use natural, vegan Arabic gum.

Why should I sell my own brand of papers instead of just stocking RAW or Zig-Zag?
Two reasons: **Margin and Loyalty**. You can't compete with Amazon or the smoke shop down the street on the price of major brands, which leads to tiny profit margins. By creating *your own* brand, you **own the product**, you set the price, and you enjoy much healthier margins. More importantly, you create a product that customers can **only get from you**, which builds loyalty and drives repeat traffic to your store.

What are my printing options? Can I print on the paper itself?

Yes, this is a core part of our service. Once you inquire, our team will send you the exact **dieline templates** for the product you're interested in. You can have your designer place your art, or you can simply send us your logo and assets, and **our in-house design team will create a professional, print-ready design for you, 100% free of charge**.

What is a 'magnetic closure' and is it worth the extra cost?
The magnetic closure is a small, thin magnet embedded in the booklet flap that keeps it securely shut. It's **100% worth it** for a premium brand. Custom Rolling Trays Wholesale for Dispensaries & Cannabis Brands

The Permanent, High-Margin Billboard for Your Customer's Coffee Table

This is your brand's most permanent marketing asset. Our wholesale custom rolling trays are the essential centerpiece for any dispensary, cannabis brand, or B2B buyer. A rolling tray is far more than an accessory; it's a *workspace*. It's the "command center" for the entire smoking ritual. By leaving this space blank, you are wasting the single most valuable piece of branding real estate you can own. By branding it, your logo becomes a permanent fixture in your customer's home, visible during every single session.

Our collection is a complete, one-stop solution for your entire "good, better, best" retail strategy. It includes the cost-effective, high-impact tin rolling trays (perfect for full-color promos), premium aluminum trays, and the eco-conscious bamboo rolling trays. For the brand that wants to tell a story, we offer biodegradable trays. And for the "top-shelf" connoisseur, we have the high-tech LED rolling trays and the ultra-functional magnetic lid trays—all ready for your full custom branding.

Custom trays are a high-margin, "keystone" retail product and a long-lasting promotional item. They create lasting impressions, build brand loyalty, and generate significant, reliable revenue streams for your business.

Explore Our Wholesale Rolling Tray Collection

We offer a material and style for every brand identity, customer type, and price point, from high-volume promos to high-margin luxury.

  • Custom Tin Trays (The "Workhorse"): This is the #1, high-velocity seller. These classic metal trays are lightweight, durable, and most importantly, **cost-effective**. Their entire surface (top, bottom, and sides) is the perfect canvas for vibrant, **edge-to-edge full-color printing**. This is your go-to for bold, loud, and complex artwork. Perfect for both retail and high-volume promotional giveaways.
  • Custom Bamboo/Wood Trays (The "Eco-Premium"): This is your "lifestyle" option. Made from sustainable, genuine bamboo or wood, this tray feels warm, natural, and high-end. It's a piece of "functional home decor." This is the perfect canvas for **permanent, elegant laser engraving**, which burns your logo into the wood for a timeless, rustic finish. It aligns your brand with sustainability and justifies a premium price.
  • Custom Aluminum Trays (The "Heavy-Duty"): This is a step-up in quality from tin. Our aluminum trays are thicker, more rigid, and have a more substantial, premium feel. They are often milled from a solid piece of aluminum and are a favorite for high-end brands that want a durable, "buy-it-for-life" metal option that still supports full-color printing.
  • Custom LED Rolling Trays (The "Wow-Factor"): This is your "top-shelf" hero product. A USB-rechargeable tray with built-in, multi-color LEDs that illuminate the rolling surface. It's the ultimate "Instagrammable" accessory and a high-tech "statement piece." It's a high-margin, high-desire item that creates a "wow" moment and positions your brand as innovative, modern, and fun.
  • Trays with Magnetic Lids (The "Functional Upgrade"): This solves your customer's biggest problems: spills, portability, privacy, and dust. The custom-printed magnetic lid snaps securely onto the tray, protecting the contents. This **doubles your branding real estate** (a full print on the tray *and* the lid) and creates a high-utility, high-margin product that customers love for its practicality.
  • Biodegradable Trays (The "Eco-Promo"): The perfect "guilt-free" option. Made from hemp-based bioplastic, these trays are 100% biodegradable and compostable. They are the perfect, low-cost item for an Earth Day promotion, a "Gift With Purchase" with your organic flower, or for any brand that wants to make a powerful, sustainable statement.

The B2B Advantage: Why a Branded Tray is Your Smartest Investment

  • A Full-Sized, Permanent Brand Billboard A lighter is lost, packaging is thrown away, but a rolling tray *lives* on your customer's coffee table. It's a permanent, 24/7 advertisement in their most personal space. Its large, flat surface is a true billboard, and our edge-to-edge printing allows for stunning, high-impact artwork that demands attention.
  • Unlock Excellent, High-Profit Margins Trays are a "keystone" retail product. A classic tin tray that costs you $4-6 in bulk can easily retail for $20-$25. A premium LED tray that costs $20 can retail for $50-$60. The perceived value is incredibly high, giving you a healthy, protected profit margin and a reliable revenue stream.
  • A Tray for Every Brand, Price Point, and Customer Our collection is a "good, better, best" model. Use **Tin Trays** as your "good," high-volume, entry-level product. Use **Bamboo/Wood Trays** as your "better," eco-premium upsell. Use **LED Trays** as your "best," high-tech, luxury "halo product." You can now serve every customer, from the budget-conscious to the connoisseur, all under your brand.
  • Build a Complete "Brand Ecosystem" The tray is the centerpiece. When a customer uses *your* branded tray as their base, they will want the matching accessories. This is your chance to sell them *your* branded grinder, *your* branded lighter, and *your* branded stash jar. You are no longer just selling a product; you are selling a complete, cohesive brand experience.
  • Flexible MOQs & Free Professional Design We are your B2B partner. For many of our in-stock items (like bamboo and aluminum), we can offer **no minimum order quantity** for laser engraving. For high-volume printed tin, MOQs are low and flexible. Best of all, our in-house, professional design team will provide **100% free, no-obligation mockups** for you to approve.

Ready to put your brand on their coffee table?

This is the most permanent, high-margin, high-visibility branding you can buy. Click the button to request a free, no-obligation mockup and our design team will create a stunning, print-ready design for your own line of custom rolling trays.

Request a Free Mockup Browse All Rolling Trays

Frequently Asked Questions About Custom Rolling Trays

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for custom trays?
Our MOQs are extremely flexible. For in-stock items like our bamboo and aluminum trays, we can often offer **no minimum order quantity** for laser engraving. For full-color, edge-to-edge printed tin trays or custom-molded items like LED and biodegradable trays, a higher MOQ (typically 100-250 units) is required for the factory setup.

What is the average turnaround time?
It depends on the tray. Our "No Minimum," in-stock laser-engraved items can often ship in as fast as **1-3 business days**. For larger, bulk-production, full-color printed orders, the standard turnaround time (including production and shipping) is typically **3-5 weeks** *after* you have approved your final digital mockup.

What's the best branding method: Printing vs. Laser Engraving?
It depends on the material and your brand. **Full-Color Printing (UV or Sublimation)** is for our tin, aluminum, and LED trays. It's for bold, vibrant, edge-to-edge, colorful artwork. **Laser Engraving** is for our bamboo and wood trays. It creates a permanent, premium, "burned-in" logo that is subtle, tactile, and elegant.

What is the real difference between a Tin tray and an Aluminum tray?
Think "good vs. better." A **Tin Tray** (like the classic "RAW" tray) is made from a thin sheet of metal, is very lightweight, and has rounded, rolled edges. It's the cost-effective, high-volume standard. An **Aluminum Tray** is typically CNC-milled from a solid block of aluminum. It's much thicker, heavier, has flat, premium-feeling edges, and is far more rigid and durable. It's a high-end retail product.

How durable is the printing on the trays? Will it scratch off?
Our full-color printing is extremely durable. We use advanced UV-cured ink or sublimation processes that bond the design to the metal at a molecular level. It is designed to be scratch-resistant, water-resistant, and fade-resistant for many years of regular use. It is not a cheap sticker that will peel off.

What is the battery life on the LED rolling tray?
Our LED rolling trays are built with high-quality, long-lasting, USB-rechargeable lithium-ion batteries. A single charge will typically provide **2-4 hours of continuous light**, and the battery is rated for hundreds of charge cycles, ensuring a long, functional life for the product.

name: Custom Vape Pen
description:
Custom Vape Pens & 510 Batteries Wholesale for Dispensaries

The Ultimate "Razor" for Your "Razor Blade" Cartridge Sales Strategy

Vaping is, without question, the most dominant and profitable category in cannabis retail. But when a customer buys a cartridge, what battery are they using? A generic, unbranded one? Or worse, a *competitor's*? Our wholesale custom vape pens and 510 thread batteries are your most powerful strategic tool for building a "brand ecosystem" and a bulletproof loyalty loop.

Think of it as the classic "razor/razor blade" model. The battery is the "razor"—the one permanent, reusable piece of hardware that stays with your customer, in their pocket, every single day. Your cartridge is the "razor blade." By branding the battery, you create a powerful, psychological link that ensures they return to *your* dispensary for the "matching" cartridge. It's a high-margin upsell that guarantees future, recurring revenue.

Our collection is a complete B2B solution for your entire retail and merchandise strategy. It includes the "connoisseur" variable voltage 510 batteries, the "all-in-one" disposable vape pens, the "lifestyle" all-over print batteries, the "workhorse" rechargeable vape pens, and the "component" glass cartridges—all customizable with your dispensary branding.

Explore Our "Good, Better, Best" Wholesale Vape Collection

We provide a complete "retail ladder" to capture every customer, from the first-timer to the tech-savvy connoisseur, all under your single, unified brand.

1. The "Good" / Workhorse: Standard Rechargeable 510 Batteries

This is your high-velocity, must-have item. The classic, buttonless (or single-button), USB-rechargeable "stick" battery. It's the simple, reliable, and cost-effective solution that every first-time cartridge customer needs. This is the perfect "entry-level" branded upsell, a reliable "house battery" that you can sell for a healthy margin and use to start the loyalty loop.

2. The "Better" / Connoisseur Upgrade: Variable Voltage 510 Batteries

This is your high-margin upsell for the educated consumer. A connoisseur with a $60 live rosin cart knows not to burn it with a cheap, high-voltage battery. A **variable voltage** battery (like our Tri-Volt) allows the user to select the perfect temperature—low for flavor, high for clouds. Stocking this positions your brand as an expert, protects your customer's investment, and justifies a premium price point.

3. The "Best" / Brand Billboard: All-Over Print Batteries

This is for the "lifestyle" brand that wants to make a loud statement. Using 360-degree, edge-to-edge full-color printing, we can wrap the *entire battery* in your custom artwork. This is a walking, pocket-sized billboard, perfect for artist collaborations, "limited edition" drops, or a bold brand identity that stands out. It's a high-margin, "collector" focused item that will be shared on social media.

4. The "All-in-One": Custom Disposable Vape Pens

This is the ultimate "grab-and-go" convenience. This is the solution for tourists, travelers, or new users who want a no-fuss, zero-commitment experience. We provide the complete, high-quality disposable unit (battery + tank), fully branded with your logo, ready for your oil-filling and packaging. It's a high-turnover, complete, branded solution that captures a huge market segment.

5. The "Component": Wholesale Branded Cartridges

For the brand, cultivator, or extractor that fills their own carts. The hardware you use is a direct reflection of your oil's quality. We provide high-quality, reliable, lead-free **glass and ceramic cartridges**, ready for your custom branding on the cart itself. Ensure your premium oil is housed in a premium, trustworthy component that won't leak or burn.

The B2B Advantage: Why Branded Vapes are a High-Margin Necessity

  • 1. Create a Powerful, High-Margin "Bundle" & Upsell This is the #1, most immediate benefit. **Never sell a cartridge alone.** A branded battery is the easiest, most logical upsell you can make, and it dramatically increases your Average Order Value (AOV). A simple budtender script like, "Buy any two of our cartridges, and get the matching branded battery for 50% off" is a high-profit, proven sales strategy.
  • 2. Build Your "Brand Ecosystem" & Lock In Cartridge Sales This is the "razor/razor blade" strategy. The battery is the **permanent "home" for your cartridge**. When your customer has your beautifully branded battery, they will feel a powerful, psychological pull to return to *your* store to buy the *your* branded cartridge that "matches" it. You are locking in that future, recurring revenue.
  • 3. Build Customer Trust with Reliable, Quality Hardware This is the most critical, trust-building (or breaking) point. When a customer uses a cheap, generic battery that **burns their $50 live-rosin cartridge**, who do they blame? *You*. They blame the dispensary that sold them the cart. By providing a high-quality, reliable, branded battery (especially a **variable voltage** one), you are *protecting* their investment, ensuring they have a good experience, and building trust in your brand as a quality expert.
  • 4. A Solution for Every Customer Tier (Good, Better, Best) Our collection allows you to serve your entire customer base. You have the **"Good"** (the simple, cost-effective rechargeable pen) for the new or budget-conscious customer. You have the **"Better"** (the variable voltage battery) for the connoisseur. And you have the **"Best"** (the all-over-print) for the lifestyle-focused "hype" customer.
  • 5. Durable, Premium Branding Options & Flexible MOQs We make it easy to look good. We offer **full-color, durable UV printing** for your logo or a **permanent, premium laser engraving** for a subtle, high-end finish on metal models. Best of all, for many of our in-stock batteries, we offer **no minimum order quantities** (for engraving), so you can test the market with zero risk.

Ready to "own the battery" and lock in your cartridge sales?

This is the single most important accessory for building a loyalty loop. Click the button to request a free, no-obligation mockup and our design team will show you how your logo looks on a premium 510-thread battery.

Request a Free Mockup Browse All Vape Hardware

Frequently Asked Questions About Custom Vape Batteries

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for custom vapes?
Our MOQs are extremely flexible. For many of our in-stock 510-thread batteries, we can offer **no minimum order quantity** for laser engraving. For items requiring full-color printing (like the all-over-print), MOQs are still very low, typically starting at 25-50 units. Fully custom-manufactured disposable pens will have a higher MOQ.

What is the average turnaround time?
It depends on the product. Our "No Minimum," in-stock laser-engraved batteries can often ship in as fast as **1-3 business days**. For larger, bulk-production, full-color printed orders, the standard turnaround time is typically **3-5 weeks**. For fully custom disposable vapes (made to order), the timeline is usually **4-6+ weeks** *after* you have approved your final digital mockup.

What's the difference between a "stick" battery and a "variable voltage" battery?
This is the key to upselling. A **standard "stick" battery** has one heat setting that is "one-size-fits-all." A **variable voltage battery** has 3-4 heat settings. This is a *premium feature* that allows connoisseurs to **dial in the perfect temperature** for their specific oil (e.g., a low temp for delicate live-rosin to preserve flavor, a high temp for thick distillate). It's a high-margin upsell that shows you're an expert.

What are my customization options? (Printing vs. Engraving)
**Full-Color UV Printing** is our most popular option. It allows us to print your vibrant, multi-color, or photorealistic logo directly onto the battery. **Laser Engraving** is for our metal-body batteries. It's a permanent, subtle, and premium process that etches your logo into the metal for a "tone-on-tone" finish that will never peel or fade.

Will your batteries work with *my* 510-thread cartridges?
**Yes.** All of our batteries use the "universal 510-thread" connection, which is the industry standard for 99% of all cartridges on the market. Our batteries are fully compatible with all standard 510-thread carts.

Why should I sell a branded battery instead of a generic one?
**Margin and Loyalty.** A generic battery builds *nothing* for you. You make a tiny margin, and the customer has no reason to come back to you. A **branded battery** is a high-margin upsell that also acts as a permanent advertisement in their pocket, reminding them to return to *your* store to buy *your* cartridges. It's the "razor/razor blade" strategy, and it's the key to winning the cartridge market.

No Minimum Custom Cannabis Products for Small Dispensaries & New Brands

The End of 1,000-Unit Commitments. Start Your Brand for $50, Not $5,000.

Welcome to the solution that shatters the single biggest barrier to entry for new cannabis brands. For decades, "custom merchandise" meant one thing: a massive, risky, 1,000-unit bulk order that ties up your cash and stuffs your back room with unsold inventory. Our No Minimum Order program is the antidote. It's designed specifically for small dispensaries, new brands, pop-up shops, and boutique retailers who need the agility to build a professional brand without the crippling upfront cost and risk.

This program is built on a simple, revolutionary model: we stock a huge collection of high-quality "blank" products in our warehouse, and we customize them for you on-demand using our in-house, advanced laser engraving and UV printing technology. This means you can order one custom grinder, ten custom stash jars, or twenty-five custom rolling trays. Whether you're launching a new dispensary, testing a new logo, creating "limited edition" drops, or running a boutique operation, our no-minimum program lets you access professional custom branding on your terms. Start small, test the market, see what sells, and *then* scale up.

Explore Our On-Demand "No Minimum" Product Collection

This collection includes our most popular, high-quality hardware, all ready for your logo to be added in as little as 24-48 hours. Order exactly what you need, when you need it.

Custom Grinders (No Minimum)

This is our flagship "no-minimum" category. Offer your customers a full "Good, Better, Best" lineup from day one. Our on-demand selection includes the industry-standard 4-Piece Aluminum Grinder, the sleek Matte Coated Grinder (perfect for UV printing), the heavy-duty Zinc Grinder, and the simple, cost-effective 2-Piece Grinder. We also offer specialty sizes like the massive "Big Grinder" and the "PhatBoy".

Custom Storage & Cases (No Minimum)

Offer your customers professional, branded solutions for freshness, discretion, and portability. Our on-demand storage line includes the classic Glass Stash Jar with a laser-engravable bamboo lid, the premium, ultra-secure StashSafe Container, and the ultimate on-the-go "doob tube," the metal J-Shield. We even offer discreet, "hidden-in-plain-sight" options like the Discreet Herb Protector.

Custom Trays & Ashtrays (No Minimum)

Complete your accessory lineup with a branded "home base" for your customer's ritual. Our "no-minimum" program includes the premium, CNC-milled Aluminum Rolling Tray, which features a flawless surface for engraving or printing. We also offer the durable, lounge-ready Custom Aluminum Ashtray, a heavy-duty, indestructible option perfect for patios or as a premium retail item.

The B2B Advantage: Why "No Minimum" is a Smarter Strategy

  • 1. Zero Financial Risk, Zero Wasted Inventory This is the #1 benefit. The "old way" forces you to tie up thousands of dollars in a 1,000-unit bulk order, before you've sold a single one. Our program frees your cash flow. You can order 10 trays and 20 grinders, see what sells, and then re-order. You will never sit on a box of 900 unsold, bright-pink grinders again.
  • 2. Test, Learn, and Scale Intelligently This is the "agile" way to build a brand. Want to test three different logo designs? Order 10 of each. Want to see if your customers prefer matte black or classic silver? Order 15 of both. Our program lets you use real-world sales data to make intelligent decisions, rather than just guessing.
  • 3. Create "Limited Edition" & Seasonal Drops with Zero Waste This is how you create hype. Want to do a special "4/20" grinder? Or a "Halloween" stash jar? With no minimums, you can order exactly 50 units for a limited-edition drop. You can create urgency, sell out, and build a "collector" mentality among your customers—all without the risk of excess inventory left over.
  • 4. Professional Branding from Day One New brands and small dispensaries often look "new" because they can't afford branded merchandise. This program levels the playing field. You can have a fully stocked, 10-product "merch wall" with your professional logo on day one, even if you only have a few units of each. It makes you look established, professional, and trustworthy from the moment you open your doors.
  • 5. The Perfect Solution for Pop-Ups & Event Vendors Running a booth at a trade show or festival? You don't need 1,000 grinders. You need 150. Our program is the *perfect* solution for event-based businesses, pop-up shops, and artists who need a specific, small-batch run of high-quality merchandise for a single event.

Ready to build your brand, your way?

This is the smartest, safest, and most agile way to launch your merchandise line. Click the button to request a free, no-obligation mockup and our design team will show you how your logo looks on a single unit. Start building your brand today.

Request a Free Mockup Browse All No-Minimum Products

Frequently Asked Questions About "No Minimum"

What does "No Minimum" *really* mean? Can I actually order one?
Yes. It means exactly what it says. You can go to our 4-Piece Aluminum Grinder, upload your logo, and order a single, custom-engraved grinder. You can order one. You can order seven. You can order 135. You have total flexibility.

How is this possible? How is it different from a "bulk" order?
It's all about our technology and process. **"No Minimum"** products are items we keep in-stock in our warehouse. We customize them for you on-demand using our in-house laser engravers and UV printers. **"Bulk"** products (like custom rolling papers, LED trays, or biodegradable items) are custom-manufactured for you at a factory. Those require a large factory setup, which is why they have a high MOQ.

What is the turnaround time for "No Minimum" items?
It's the fastest in the industry. Because we stock the products and customize them in-house, "No Minimum" orders often ship in as fast as 1-3 business days. This is a game-changer for a pop-up event or a last-minute restock.

Is the per-item price higher than a bulk order?
Yes, and this is the strategic trade-off. The price for *one* custom grinder might be $30. The price for 1,000 grinders might be $10 each. You are paying a premium for the convenience, speed, and total elimination of financial risk. You are saving money on your *total order* (paying $30 vs. $10,000) and protecting your cash flow.

What are my branding options for "No Minimum" products?
The two main on-demand methods are **Laser Engraving** and **UV Printing**. **Laser Engraving** (for metal, wood, glass) is a permanent, subtle, and premium "etched" finish. **UV Printing** (for matte grinders, some trays) is a durable, full-color printing process for vibrant, colorful logos.

Which products are *NOT* included in the "No Minimum" program?
Any product that has to be **fully custom-manufactured from scratch** at a factory will have a minimum. This includes all **Custom Rolling Papers**, **Pre-Rolled Cones**, **Biodegradable Products**, **LED Trays**, and **Custom Apparel**. This "No Minimum" category is specifically for our in-stock, on-demand hardware.

Our wholesale cannabis promotional products are a complete, high-impact marketing toolkit designed for dispensary grand openings, brand launches, trade show giveaways, and customer loyalty programs. While a flyer is instantly discarded, a useful, branded item is kept, valued, and used daily, delivering the lowest cost-per-impression (CPI) in the industry.

Our program gives you ultimate flexibility, from "no minimum" on-demand items to high-volume bulk orders. Our "No-Min" program is perfect for testing a concept or for a last-minute event, featuring items like the mini grinder keychain, the portable ashtray keychain, and the keychain stash jar. For high-volume, "carpet-bomb" marketing campaigns, we offer the branded matchbook, the sleek grinder card, and the classic custom rolling paper booklets.

Promotional products build a reciprocal relationship with your customer. When you give them a free, functional gift, they feel appreciated, which builds real loyalty. Our wholesale promotional items deliver maximum impact at budget-friendly prices, turning your marketing spend into a long-lasting, tangible asset.

Explore Our High-Impact Promotional Collection

We have a high-utility, "sticky" item for every marketing goal and budget.

Our No-Minimum program is perfect. Need 20,000 matchbooks for a festival sponsorship? Our Bulk Program is the most cost-effective solution. We are your partner for every scale.

Use a low-cost item (like a grinder card) as a **"Gift With Purchase" (GWP)** to increase your Average Order Value (AOV) ("Spend $100, get a free grinder card!").

Frequently Asked Questions About Promotional Products

What's the best promo item for the *lowest* budget?
For the absolute lowest cost-per-item, your best bets are our high-volume, bulk-only products: Custom Matchbooks, Grinder Cards, and basic Plastic Lighters. These are designed to be ordered in quantities of 1,000+, driving the per-item price down to pennies.

What's the difference between "No Minimum" and "Bulk" promos?
This is a critical distinction in our program. **"No Minimum"** items (like our keychains and metal ashtrays) are products we keep in-stock and customize for you on-demand (1-3 day turnaround). **"Bulk"** items (like rolling papers and matchbooks) are custom-manufactured for you from scratch at a factory. The B2B Advantage: Why Custom Stash Jars are a High-Margin Staple

A 360-Degree Branding Canvas & Flexible MOQs We offer the right branding for the right product. **Laser Engraving** for a premium, permanent, and subtle logo on bamboo lids and metal jars. **Vibrant, Full-Color UV Printing** for bold, eye-catching, full-wrap designs on glass and all-over print jars. Frequently Asked Questions About Custom Stash Jars
