description:
Eco-Friendly Wood & Organic Cannabis Products Wholesale

The Ultimate Collection for the Conscious Cannabis Brand

This is more than a product category; it's your brand's story and your core values, made tangible. Our wholesale wood and organic cannabis products collection is the definitive B2B solution for eco-conscious dispensaries, cultivators, and brands who want to *prove* their commitment to sustainability. In a market where consumers are actively shunning single-use plastics and "fast-fashion" accessories, this collection is your key to capturing the loyalty of the high-value, conscious consumer.

These aren't just "merch"—they are physical proof of your brand's identity. Our collection is a complete ecosystem of sustainable accessories, including beautiful bamboo rolling trays, premium genuine wood grinders, revolutionary hemp biodegradable grinders and biodegradable rolling trays, plastic-free bamboo joint cases, and elegant wooden ashtrays.

As cannabis consumers increasingly demand sustainability, wood and organic accessories provide dispensaries with a premium, eco-friendly merchandise line that aligns with customer values. These natural products offer a unique, warm, and tactile aesthetic, a powerful environmental story, and a clear "premium" positioning opportunity for conscious cannabis brands. This isn't a niche; it's a massive, and growing, market shift. Aligning your brand with it is the smartest strategic move you can make.

Explore Our Sustainable Wholesale Collection

Each product is chosen for its low environmental impact, high-quality feel, and perfect canvas for your branding—most often, with our premium, permanent laser engraving.

  • Custom Bamboo Rolling Trays: The premium, eco-friendly workhorse. Bamboo is not a wood; it's a fast-growing grass that is one of the most sustainable resources on earth. It's also lightweight, incredibly durable, and has a beautiful, natural grain. A laser-engraved bamboo tray feels like a high-end, permanent piece of home decor.
  • Genuine Wood Grinders: The "top-shelf" natural option. Crafted from real, sustainable hardwoods like walnut or bamboo, these grinders feel substantial and luxurious. They typically feature a high-performance metal grinding chamber inside, offering the best of both worlds: a warm, natural exterior and a durable, efficient interior. Laser engraving burns your logo *into* the wood for a timeless, "branded" look.
  • Hemp Biodegradable Grinders: The ultimate eco-promo tool. This is your brand's story in a single product. Made from a durable, compressed hemp bioplastic, these 2-piece grinders are 100% biodegradable and compostable. They are surprisingly tough and functional, and they make the perfect "guilt-free" giveaway or low-cost retail item for Earth Day, 4/20, or as a GWP with your organic flower.
  • Biodegradable Rolling Trays: A powerful, high-volume, and low-cost statement. Like our hemp grinders, these trays are made from plant-based, biodegradable materials. They are lightweight, sturdy, and the perfect item for a large-scale promotional campaign or festival, showing your commitment to "leaving no trace."
  • Airtight Bamboo Joint Cases: The reusable, plastic-free "doob tube." This is the perfect, sustainable upsell to your pre-roll program. Made from 100% bamboo, this case is durable, stylish, and often features a secure, odor-resistant top. It's the "adult" version of a plastic tube, and a product your customers will feel good about using.
  • Portable Wooden Ashtrays (with Cover): This is a piece of functional decor. A small, elegant wooden ashtray (often with a lid to conceal ash and odor) feels warm, natural, and sophisticated. It's a "lifestyle" product that aligns with a high-end, minimalist, or "Scandi-style" brand aesthetic.

The "Green" Advantage: Why This is a Smart Business Strategy

  • Tell an Authentic, Powerful Brand Story These products are marketing. They are a physical, tactile way to tell your customers what you stand for. When you sell organic, sun-grown flower, your merchandise *must* reflect that. These accessories create a cohesive, authentic brand story that builds deep, values-based trust.
  • Unlock Premium Positioning & Fatter Margins The "conscious consumer" is a high-value demographic, and they are *proven* to be willing to pay more for products that align with their values. These are not commodity items. A "Genuine Walnut Grinder" or a "Hemp Bioplastic Tray" justifies a premium price point, allowing you to escape the price war and enjoy significantly healthier profit margins.
  • Capture the Fastest-Growing Market (Millennials & Gen Z) The demand for sustainable, plastic-free, and natural products is not a "niche"—it's a massive, permanent market shift being driven by your most valuable customers. This collection positions your dispensary as a forward-thinking leader in that movement, not a follower, helping you capture this loyal, high-value demographic.
  • A Unique, Natural, & Tactile Aesthetic Differentiate yourself from the sea of sterile metal and cheap plastic. Wood and bamboo are *warm*, *natural*, and *tactile*. Every genuine wood product has a unique grain, making every single piece one-of-a-kind. This creates a special, high-end, and personal customer experience that builds a deep connection to the product and, by extension, your brand.
  • The Perfect Canvas for Permanent, Premium Branding **Laser engraving** is the perfect partner for natural materials. It's not a print that can peel or fade. It *burns your logo* into the wood or bamboo, creating a permanent, deep, tactile, and rustic "branded" finish. It's a premium branding method that perfectly matches the product's organic aesthetic.

Ready to align your products with your brand's values?

Let's create a beautiful, sustainable product line that tells your story and resonates deeply with your best customers. Click the button to request a free, no-obligation mockup and our design team will show you how your logo looks with a premium laser engraving on these stunning natural products.

Request a Free Mockup Browse All Eco-Products

Frequently Asked Questions About Wood & Organic Products

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for these products?
MOQs vary by material. Our genuine wood grinders and bamboo trays are often available for laser engraving with **very low MOQs** (sometimes as low as a single unit). This gives you incredible flexibility. Our biodegradable grinders and trays, which require special molding, are produced in bulk and typically have a higher MOQ (starting around 100-250+ units) to be cost-effective.

What is the best branding method for wood and bamboo?
**Laser Engraving** is the #1 choice, by far. It is 100% permanent because it physically burns your logo *into* the material. It creates a deep, tactile, and rustic "branded" finish that perfectly complements the natural aesthetic. It will never peel, fade, or rub off. For some items, we can also offer high-adhesion printing.

Are the "Biodegradable" grinders and trays actually durable?
Yes, absolutely. You'll be surprised. They are very tough and durable, made from a compressed hemp-based bioplastic. They feature sharp, molded teeth (for the grinders) and are designed for everyday use. While not a "buy-it-for-life" item like stainless steel, they are a high-quality, fully functional product that will last your customer a long time before it begins its biodegradable process (in a compost environment).

What's the difference between bamboo and wood?
It's a story of sustainability and aesthetics. **Bamboo** (like on our rolling trays) is technically a grass, not a wood. It's one of the fastest-growing plants on earth, making it an *extremely* sustainable resource. It's lightweight and has a bright, recognizable grain. **Wood** (like on our grinders) often refers to hardwoods like Walnut or Maple. These are also sustainable when sourced properly, and offer a heavier, darker, and more "premium furniture" feel.

Why should I stock these over cheaper plastic/metal accessories?
You stock metal and plastic to serve *everyone* and to hit a low price point. You stock wood and hemp to serve the *conscious consumer*. This customer is not shopping for the cheapest option; they are shopping for the product that best reflects their identity and values. This is a high-value, loyal customer, and this product line allows you to capture them, justify a premium price, and build a brand that stands for something more than just price.

How do I clean wood and bamboo products?
For genuine wood and bamboo, you should **never** soak them in water or alcohol, as this can cause the material to warp, swell, or crack. They should be cleaned by wiping them with a slightly damp cloth. Any interior metal components (like in our grinders) can be cleaned carefully with a brush and a small amount of isopropyl alcohol.

name: Storage
description:
Cannabis Storage Solutions Wholesale for Dispensaries & Retailers

The Complete B2B Solution for Freshness, Discretion, and Portability

This is the category that protects your customer's investment and solves their #1 concern. Our wholesale cannabis storage collection is a comprehensive, "Good, Better, Best" ecosystem for dispensaries, delivery services, and retail operations. When a customer buys premium flower, their top priorities are **1) protecting its freshness** (terpenes) and **2) ensuring total discretion** (odor). Your brand's ability to provide a high-quality, branded solution to these problems is a mark of professionalism that builds instant, lasting trust.

Our collection is a complete, one-stop shop for every storage need. It's not just one product; it's a full ecosystem. We offer the high-tech carbon-lined smell-proof pouches for active odor neutralization. We have the "at-home" staples like airtight herb storage jars for maximum freshness. For on-the-go, we provide durable, plastic-free joint cases and simple smell-proof bags. And for your core packaging needs, we offer fully-brandable, compliant resealable mylar bags.

Quality storage solutions are a high-margin, high-utility upsell that builds your brand. Instead of letting your customer walk out with a generic, unbranded exit bag, you have an opportunity to sell them a permanent, branded solution they will use every single day. This is how you build a professional brand, solve real customer problems, and generate reliable, recurring revenue.

Explore Our Complete Storage Ecosystem

We provide a solution for every use case, from the moment of purchase to at-home storage and on-the-go portability, all ready for your brand.

1. Active Odor Control: Carbon-Lined Pouches

This is your "premium tech" solution for total discretion. These multi-layered pouches feature an inner lining of **activated carbon (charcoal)**. This lining doesn't just *trap* smell; it actively *absorbs and neutralizes* odor molecules. These are a must-have for professionals, travelers, and customers in multi-unit housing. Many feature combination locks and weather-resistant zippers, making them a high-margin, high-value "security" product.

2. At-Home Freshness: Airtight Stash Jars

This is the "at-home" staple for preserving terpenes. Our collection of glass, ceramic, and premium glass stash jars features airtight seals (often with silicone gaskets and bamboo/metal lids) to lock in freshness and lock out air and moisture. They are the perfect, permanent "coffee table billboard" for your brand, and the ideal upsell for any flower purchase. We can laser-engrave the lids or print directly on the glass.

3. On-the-Go Portability: Joint Cases & Small Pouches

This category solves the "crushed pre-roll" problem. Our bamboo joint cases are a stylish, sustainable, and plastic-free way to protect pre-rolls. They are durable, smell-resistant, and look incredible with a laser-engraved logo. This category also includes smaller, pocket-sized smell-proof pouches, perfect for a gram or two, and a perfect low-cost giveaway or add-on item.

4. Professional Packaging: Resealable Mylar Bags

This is the foundation of your product and exit packaging. Our resealable mylar bags are the industry standard for a reason. They are **heat-sealable** for compliance and freshness, **opaque** (or with a window) for UV protection, and feature **child-resistant (CR) zip-locks**. They are the most cost-effective solution for packaging your flower, edibles, or pre-rolls. The entire surface is a blank canvas for your full-color, edge-to-edge branding, turning a compliance item into a professional marketing tool.

The B2B Storage Strategy: A High-Margin, Problem-Solving Category

  • 1. Solve Your Customer's #1 Problem (Discretion) This is the most critical benefit. More than any other accessory, smell-proof storage solves an immediate, practical, and often high-stress problem. Your customer is thinking, "How do I get this home without my car smelling?" or "How do I travel with this?" or "How do I keep this in my apartment without my neighbors knowing?" By providing a branded, high-quality solution, your dispensary becomes the **problem-solver**, which builds a level of trust that is priceless.
  • 2. Protect Terpenes & Build Quality-Perception This is how you protect your *other* sale. When a customer buys $60 of your top-shelf, terpene-rich flower, and it's dry and flavorless two days later because they stored it in a plastic sandwich bag, they will blame *your flower*. By upselling them a $15 airtight, branded glass jar, you are **protecting their investment**, guaranteeing them a better experience, and positioning your brand as an expert in quality and freshness.
  • 3. The Easiest High-Margin Upsell at the POS This category is a profit-driver. It's not a "want"; it's a "need." Instead of just giving away a generic plastic exit bag, your budtender has a clear upsell path. "Would you like our branded, carbon-lined, child-resistant pouch for $15 to keep this secure and 100% discreet?" It's a high-value add-on that solves a problem and significantly boosts your Average Order Value (AOV).
  • 4. Build a Brand Ecosystem for Every Use Case This collection allows you to serve your customer's entire lifestyle, all under *your* brand. You can sell them the **"at-home"** airtight jar, the **"on-the-go"** joint case, the **"travel"** carbon-lined pouch, and the **"product package"** Mylar bag. You become the single, trusted, professional source for all their needs.
  • 5. The Mark of a Professional, Compliant Operation A branded, compliant child-resistant Mylar bag or a discrete, sealed pouch for a delivery order isn't just a bag—it's a sign of a safe, professional, and law-abiding business. It shows customers, and regulators, that you take your responsibilities seriously.

Ready to solve your customer's biggest concerns?

Let's create a functional, high-margin accessory line that builds trust, protects product, and promotes your brand. Click the button to request a free, no-obligation mockup and our design team will show you how your logo looks on our premium storage solutions.

Request a Free Mockup Browse All Storage Solutions

Frequently Asked Questions About Wholesale Storage

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for custom storage?
Our MOQs are extremely flexible. For many of our in-stock items, like glass jars with bamboo lids or carbon pouches, we can offer custom printing/engraving with MOQs as low as **25-50 units**. For fully custom-manufactured bags (custom sizes, colors, and full-bleed printing) like our Mylar bags, a higher MOQ (starting around 500-1000+ units) is required for the factory setup.

What's the *real* difference between "Carbon-Lined" and a standard "Smell-Proof Mylar Bag"?
The difference is **active vs. passive**. A **Mylar Bag** is *passive*; it's made of a non-porous material with an airtight seal, so it *traps* the smell inside. This is highly effective. A **Carbon-Lined Pouch** is *active*; its inner lining is made of activated carbon, which *absorbs* odor molecules from the air, effectively "scrubbing" and *neutralizing* the smell. It's a more advanced, "premium tech" solution for total discretion.

Are your storage solutions child-resistant (CR)?
**Yes.** This is a critical part of our collection. Many of our Mylar bags and some of our pouches are available with **CPSC-compliant, child-resistant (CR) locking mechanisms**. This is an essential feature for compliance in most states and a massive value-add for customers, especially parents.

What are my branding options for these products?
It depends on the material. For **bamboo lids** (on jars) and **bamboo cases**, we use **Laser Engraving** for a permanent, premium, "burned-in" look. For **glass jars**, **pouches**, and **Mylar bags**, we use durable, high-adhesion **Full-Color UV Printing** or **Screen Printing** to apply your logo or full-bleed artwork in vibrant color.

Why should I sell a branded jar instead of a generic one from Amazon?
**Brand, Trust, and Margin.** A customer *can* buy a generic jar, but they are *in your store right now* having just bought your flower. This is your moment. By offering a high-quality, *branded* version, you are attaching your dispensary's name and reputation to the solution. You are making a high-margin upsell, and you are building a "brand ecosystem" where your customer is proud to use your products.

What is the purpose of a bamboo joint case?
The bamboo joint case is the perfect **sustainable, plastic-free alternative** to the "doob tube." It solves the problem of crushed pre-rolls in a pocket or bag. It's a durable, reusable, and stylish "eco-premium" product that appeals to the environmentally-conscious consumer.

  • Premium Positioning & Higher Profit Margins: The "conscious consumer" is a high-value demographic.   • Unique, Tactile, & One-of-a-Kind Aesthetics: Unlike cold, sterile-feeling metal, wood is warm, natural, and tactile. Each genuine wood grinder has a unique grain, making every single piece truly one-of-a-kind. This creates a special, high-end, and personal customer experience that builds a deep connection to the product and your brand.
  • The Perfect Branding Canvas: **Laser engraving** on wood is arguably the most beautiful and fitting customization method. It creates a permanent, rustic, "branded" look by burning your logo *into* the wood. It can't peel, fade, or rub off, and it perfectly matches the natural, organic aesthetic of the product itself.
  • Capture a Booming, High-Value Market: The demand for sustainable, plastic-free, and natural products is not a "trend"—it's a massive, permanent market shift, especially among Millennial and Gen-Z consumers. This collection positions your dispensary as a leader in that movement, not a follower, helping you capture this valuable and loyal customer base.
  • The Perfect Pairing for Organic Flower: It's a natural fit. You wouldn't put a craft beer in a styrofoam cup. Why would a customer grind your premium, organic, sun-grown flower in a cheap plastic grinder? This collection provides the perfect accessory to bundle with and complement your top-shelf organic flower, enhancing the entire customer experience.

Ready to align your products with your values?

Click the button to request a free, no-obligation mockup and our design team will show you how your logo looks with a premium laser engraving on these stunning natural grinders.

Frequently Asked Questions About Wood & Organic Grinders

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for these grinders?
Our genuine wood grinders are often available for laser engraving with very low MOQs, sometimes as low as a single unit, giving you incredible flexibility. Our biodegradable grinders are produced in bulk, so they typically have a higher MOQ, starting around 100-250 units, to be cost-effective.

What is the best branding method for wood? Is it durable?
**Laser Engraving** is the #1 choice. It is 100% permanent because it physically burns your logo *into* the wood. It creates a deep, tactile, and rustic "branded" finish that perfectly complements the natural material. It will never peel, fade, or rub off, lasting the entire life of the grinder.

Are the "Biodegradable" grinders actually durable and functional?
Yes, absolutely. You'll be surprised. They are very tough and durable, made from a compressed hemp-based bioplastic. They feature sharp, molded teeth (from the same material) and are designed for everyday use. While they aren't a "buy-it-for-life" item like a stainless steel grinder, they are a high-quality, fully functional grinder that will last your customer a long time.

What is the difference between "Genuine Wood" and a "Wood Texture" grinder?
The difference is material and price. **Genuine Wood** (like our Genuine Wood Grinder) is made from a solid piece of real, sustainable wood, usually with a metal grinder insert. It has the authentic feel, weight, and unique grain of real wood. A **Wood Texture** grinder (like our Wooden Texture Grinder) is typically a standard aluminum or zinc grinder that has a durable, high-fidelity wood grain pattern printed or dipped onto it. It gives you the *look* of wood with the light weight and low cost of aluminum.

Why should I stock these over a cheaper aluminum grinder?
You stock aluminum grinders to serve *everyone*. You stock wood and hemp grinders to serve the *conscious consumer*. This customer is not shopping for the cheapest option; they are shopping for the product that best reflects their identity and values. This is a high-value, loyal customer, and this product line allows you to capture them, justify a premium price, and build a brand that stands for something more.

How do I clean a wood grinder?
For genuine wood grinders, you should **never** soak the wooden exterior in alcohol or water, as it can cause the wood to warp or crack. The metal interior grinder chamber can be carefully cleaned with a brush and isopropyl alcohol. The wooden exterior should only be wiped with a slightly damp cloth.

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for specialty grinders?

Are the finishes (iridescent, gold, ceramic) durable?
Yes. These aren't cheap paints. The iridescent and gold foil finishes are applied using durable PVD coating or electroplating, making them highly resistant to flaking and scratching from normal use. The ceramic coating is non-stick and bonded at a high temperature, designed for long-term performance.

How durable is the "All-Over-Print" design? Will it peel or scratch off?
Our all-over-print grinders use an advanced, durable printing process (like full-wrap UV printing or hydro-dipping). The design is sealed onto the grinder and is resistant to fading, water, and scratching from everyday pocket-wear and use.

They are both "premium" but for different reasons. The **Titan (Stainless Steel)** is about *ultimate durability and weight*. It's a heavy, "buy-it-for-life" piece. Stock your shelves with the most essential, timeless, and powerful branding tool in the cannabis industry: custom smoking pipes. A custom pipe is more than a product; it's a piece of reusable merchandise that builds a daily, tactile connection with your customer.

Our collection is built to satisfy every consumer preference and price point. For the purist, our custom 4" glass pipes are a retail champion. Made from durable, thick borosilicate glass, these classic "spoon" pipes offer a clean, flavorful smoke and a premium feel. For the adventurer or the budget-conscious brand, our custom aluminum pipes are the perfect solution. They are virtually indestructible, highly portable, and offer a sleek, modern aesthetic. Whether you're building a high-margin retail line or looking for the perfect, durable promotional giveaway, our custom pipe program is your solution.

Explore Our Custom Pipe Collection

Our catalog is curated for quality, durability, and brand-ability. We provide the two most in-demand styles for the modern dispensary.

Custom Glass Pipes (4-Inch Spoon)

The undisputed classic. Our 4-inch borosilicate glass spoon pipes are a best-seller in dispensaries and head shops everywhere. The 4-inch size is perfect—portable yet substantial. Made from thick, durable "boro" glass, they are built to last and provide a clean, pure taste. We apply your logo or brand name directly onto the glass using a durable, high-adhesion printing process, turning this everyday staple into a beautiful, collectible branded item. They are the perfect high-margin retail product to sell alongside your top-shelf flower.

  • Material: High-Quality, Thick Borosilicate Glass
  • Style: Classic "Spoon" Pipe Design
  • Branding: Durable, Multi-Color Pad Printing on the Glass
  • Perfect For: High-margin retail, "connoisseur" branding, new flower strain promotions.

Custom Aluminum Pipes

The durable, on-the-go workhorse. Our custom aluminum pipes are designed for an active lifestyle. Made from high-grade, anodized aluminum, these pipes are lightweight, sleek, and virtually indestructible. They are the perfect companion for concerts, hiking, festivals, or for the customer who is simply tired of breaking glass. The smooth, anodized finish provides the perfect canvas for precision laser engraving, which etches your logo permanently into the surface for a premium, cannot-be-scratched-off finish. Their lower cost and high durability also make them a phenomenal promotional giveaway.

  • Material: High-Grade Anodized Aluminum
  • Style: Sleek, Modern, Multi-Piece Design (for easy cleaning)
  • Branding: Precision, Permanent Laser Engraving
  • Perfect For: Promotional giveaways, event marketing, budget-friendly retail, durability-focused customers.

The B2B Advantage: Why Custom Pipes Sell

Investing in a line of custom-branded pipes is one of the smartest merchandising decisions a dispensary or brand can make. Here's why:

  • Unbeatable Profit Margins: The perceived value of a high-quality branded pipe is significantly higher than an unbranded one. Our competitive wholesale pricing gives you ample room to create a high-margin retail category that moves units.
  • The Ultimate Upsell: A custom pipe is the easiest upsell in the building. A simple "Would you like our custom-branded glass pipe to go with that?" at the point-of-sale is an easy way to increase average order value (AOV).
  • Builds Lasting Brand Loyalty: Unlike packaging, a pipe is a permanent item. When a customer loves their "favorite pipe," they are interacting with your brand logo multiple times a day, every day, for years. This builds a deep, long-term brand affinity.
  • The Perfect Promotional Item: A durable, branded aluminum pipe is a promotional item that *actually gets used*. Give them away at events, to new customers, or as a "gift with purchase" to create a lasting, positive impression.
  • Free Professional Design Mockups: Our in-house team makes it easy. Send us your logo, and we will create a 100% free, no-obligation digital mockup showing you exactly how your logo will look on each pipe model before you ever spend a dime.

Our B2B program is ideal for dispensaries, head shops, cannabis cultivators and brands, promotional distributors, and online retailers. We provide the tools to build brand loyalty, increase sales, and create a memorable customer experience through high-quality, long-lasting branded products.

Frequently Asked Questions about Custom Pipes

Here are answers to our most common questions about our wholesale custom pipe program.

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for custom pipes?
MOQs vary by the pipe and customization method. For our custom aluminum pipes, we can often offer precision laser engraving with very low minimums, sometimes as low as a single unit! For custom glass pipes, which involve a more complex pad printing setup, the MOQ is typically higher, starting around 100 units to make the production cost-effective for you.

What's the difference between branding on glass vs. aluminum pipes?
The customization method is the main difference. On **aluminum pipes**, we use **Laser Engraving**. This etches your logo permanently into the anodized coating, revealing the raw silver aluminum underneath. It's incredibly durable and has a premium, one-color finish. On **glass pipes**, we use a special **Pad Printing** process with durable, heat-cured inks. This allows for vibrant, multi-color logos to be applied to the curved glass surface.

What is the average turnaround time?
For low-minimum, laser-engraved orders, our turnaround can be as fast as 1-3 business days. For larger bulk orders or custom-printed glass pipe orders, the standard turnaround time (including production and shipping) is typically 3-5 weeks after you approve your final design mockup.

What kind of logo file do I need to provide?
For the best, cleanest result, our in-house design team strongly prefers a **vector file** (such as .AI, .EPS, or .PDF). A vector file can be scaled to any size without losing quality. If you only have a .JPG or .PNG, send it over, and our team will work with you to vectorize it for production, usually for free.

How durable are the "custom 4-inch glass pipes"?
We specifically source pipes made from **borosilicate glass**. This is the same type of glass used in scientific lab equipment and high-end kitchenware (like Pyrex). It's much more durable and resistant to thermal shock (heating and cooling) than standard, cheap glass, making it the ideal material for a quality smoking pipe.

It's all about function. **Silicone mats** are non-stick, heat-resistant, and easy to clean, making them ideal for "working" mats where concentrates and hot tools might be placed. **Fabric-top (sublimation) mats** allow for extremely vibrant, full-color, edge-to-edge photorealistic printing. Can you brand any type of dab tool?
Almost! We have spent a decade building a supply chain for the most in-demand products. Our core catalog (mats, pens, dabbers, carb caps, containers) is fully customizable. If you have a specific, unique product in mind that you don't see on our site, please ask! We have a dedicated sourcing team that can almost always find and customize it for you.

These bags (often called "Mylar bags") are made from non-porous materials and feature a heavy-duty, airtight, water-resistant zipper lock (like a "double-zip" or "press-to-seal"). While they don't have the active odor-absorbing properties of carbon, they are extremely effective at *containing* odors for transport. They are a perfect, low-cost retail item or a "premium exit bag" that you can upsell at the point-of-sale.

Airtight Stash Jars (The "At-Home" Solution)

While pouches are for "on-the-go," airtight jars are the "at-home" standard. Our collection of custom stash jars (in glass, ceramic, or metal) features airtight silicone or bamboo seals that create a perfect, 100% smell-proof vacuum. They are the ideal solution for keeping flower fresh and odor-free on a coffee table or in a cabinet. Branding these positions you as a provider of complete storage solutions.

The B2B Advantage: Why Smell-Proof Storage is a Smart Investment

  • Solve Your Customer's #1 Real-World Problem More than any other accessory, smell-proof storage solves an immediate, practical problem. Your customer is thinking, "How do I get this home without my car smelling?" or "How do I travel with this?" or "How do I keep this in my apartment without my neighbors knowing?" By providing a branded solution, your dispensary becomes the problem-solver, which builds instant, lasting trust.
  • High-Margin, High-Utility Upsell This is one of the easiest upsells at the point-of-sale. It's not a "want"; it's a "need." Instead of giving away a free, unbranded plastic bag, your budtender can say, "Would you like one of our branded, carbon-lined, child-resistant pouches for $15 to keep this secure and discreet?" It's a high-value add-on that significantly boosts your Average Order Value (AOV).
  • Premium Branding on a Discreet, "Lifestyle" Product A logo on a smell-proof bag is a subtle, "insider" lifestyle endorsement. The customer carries it in their backpack, their glove compartment, or their suitcase. It's a product they *trust* with their privacy. Associating your brand with that level of trust, security, and discretion is incredibly powerful.
  • The Perfect Solution for Delivery & Medical For a delivery service, a branded, smell-proof "exit bag" is a mark of professionalism and safety. For medical cannabis retailers, it's an absolute necessity. It shows respect for your patients' privacy and their need to transport medicine securely and discreetly.

Frequently Asked Questions About Smell-Proof Storage

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for smell-proof storage?
Our MOQs are very flexible. For many of our in-stock carbon-lined pouches and bags, we can offer custom printing with MOQs as low as 25-50 units. For fully custom-manufactured bags (custom sizes, colors, and zippers), a higher MOQ (starting around 250-500 units) is typically required.

What's the *real* difference between "Carbon-Lined" and a standard "Smell-Proof Bag"?
A standard **Smell-Proof Bag** (like Mylar) is *non-porous* and *airtight*. It *traps* the smell inside, which is very effective. A **Carbon-Lined Pouch** is an *active* system. The activated carbon lining *absorbs* odor molecules from the air, effectively "scrubbing" the odor. It's a more advanced, effective, and premium solution for total discretion.

What are my customization options?
The most popular option is **Full-Color UV Printing** or **Screen Printing**. This allows us to apply your logo or brand name in a durable, vibrant, and clean finish onto the exterior of the pouch. For some models, we can also offer custom zipper pulls or embroidered patches for a truly "premium merchandise" feel.

Are these storage solutions also child-resistant (CR)?
Many of them are! We offer a wide range of products, from simple zipper pouches to **CPSC-compliant, child-resistant models** that feature a "push-and-slide" locking mechanism or a combination lock. This is a critical feature for compliance in many states and a massive value-add for customers (especially parents).

Why is this a better retail product than a generic pouch from Amazon?
**Brand and Trust.** A customer *can* buy a generic pouch, but they are buying from *you*. By offering a high-quality, *branded* version, you are attaching your dispensary's name and reputation to the solution. This is your high-margin, "lifestyle" hero product. **Bamboo** is a fast-growing, renewable grass, not a wood, making it one of the most sustainable and durable materials on earth. Our bamboo trays are lightweight, non-porous, and have a beautiful, bright, natural grain. Our **genuine wood** trays (like Acacia or Walnut) offer a darker, heavier, and more "premium furniture" feel. Both are the perfect canvas for **permanent laser engraving**, which burns your logo *into* the material for a tactile, rustic, and incredibly high-end "branded" finish. 2. The "Eco-Promo" Option: Biodegradable (Hemp) Trays

This is your high-volume, "guilt-free" giveaway. Made from a durable, compressed **hemp bioplastic**, these trays are 100% biodegradable and compostable. They are the perfect, low-cost, high-impact item for large-scale promotions, festival sponsorships, Earth Day campaigns, or as a "Gift With Purchase" to bundle with your organic flower. They are surprisingly tough, functional, and—most importantly—they tell a powerful story about your brand's commitment to eliminating plastic waste. They offer a huge, flat surface for a prominent logo print.

The "Green" Advantage: Why Eco-Conscious Dispensaries Choose This Line

  • 1. Tell an Authentic, Powerful Brand Story These products are a physical manifestation of your brand's values. When you sell organic, sun-grown, or "craft" flower, your merchandise *must* reflect that same ethos. These accessories create a cohesive, authentic brand story that builds deep, values-based trust. It wordlessly tells your customer, "We care about the same things you do."
  • 2. Permanent, Premium Laser Engraving This is the perfect marriage of material and branding. **Laser Engraving** is the #1 choice for wood and bamboo. It's not a print that can peel, chip, or fade. It *permanently burns* your logo into the wood, creating a deep, tactile, and elegant "branded" finish. Unlock Premium Positioning & Higher Profit Margins The "conscious consumer" is a high-value demographic, and they are *proven* to be willing to pay more for products that align with their values. This creates a special, high-end, and personal customer experience that builds a deep connection to the product and, by extension, your brand.
  • 5. Capture the Fastest-Growing, High-Value Market The demand for sustainable, plastic-free, and natural products is not a "trend"—it's a massive, permanent market shift, especially among Millennial and Gen-Z consumers. This collection positions your dispensary as a forward-thinking leader in that movement, not a follower, helping you capture this valuable and extremely loyal customer base.

Ready to align your products with your brand's values?

Frequently Asked Questions About Wood & Eco-Trays

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for these trays?
Our MOQs are extremely flexible. For our in-stock bamboo rolling trays, we can offer **no minimum order quantity** for laser engraving. This allows you to test the product with zero risk. For our biodegradable trays, which are a custom-molded promotional item, a higher MOQ (typically 100-250 units) is required to be cost-effective.

What is the best branding method for wood and bamboo?
**Laser Engraving** is the #1, and most recommended, choice. It is 100% permanent because it physically burns your logo *into* the material. It creates a deep, tactile, and rustic "branded" finish that perfectly complements the natural aesthetic. It will never peel, fade, or rub off. For our biodegradable trays, we use a durable, full-color printing process.

Are the "Biodegradable" trays actually durable?
Yes, absolutely. You'll be surprised. They are very tough and durable, made from a compressed **hemp-based bioplastic**. They are designed for everyday use—they won't get soggy or break easily. While not a "buy-it-for-life" item like a solid wood tray, they are a high-quality, fully functional product that will last your customer a long time before it begins its biodegradable process (in a compost environment).

What's the real difference between bamboo and other "genuine wood"?
It's a story of sustainability and aesthetics. **Bamboo** (like on our rolling trays) is technically a **grass**, not a wood. It's one of the fastest-growing, most renewable plants on earth, making it an *extremely* sustainable resource. It's lightweight, naturally anti-microbial, and has a bright, recognizable grain. **Genuine Wood** (like Walnut or Acacia) is a hardwood. It's also sustainable when sourced properly, and offers a darker, heavier, and more "premium furniture" feel.

How do I clean a wood or bamboo tray?
This is very important. For genuine wood and bamboo, you should **NEVER** soak them in water, put them in a dishwasher, or use harsh chemicals/isopropyl alcohol on the wood itself. This can cause the material to warp, swell, or crack. They should be cleaned by **wiping them with a slightly damp cloth** and drying them immediately.

**Why should I stock these over a cheaper tin tray?**
You stock tin trays to serve *everyone* and to hit a low price point. You stock wood and hemp trays to serve the *conscious consumer*. This is a high-value, loyal customer, and this product line allows you to capture them, justify a premium price, and build a brand that stands for something more than just price.

It's the "Rolex" of rolling trays. It's the perfect canvas for both permanent, elegant laser engraving or durable, full-color printing, and it positions your brand as a "luxury" provider.

The B2B Advantage: Why a Branded Metal Tray is Your Smartest Investment

  • A Full-Surface, Permanent Brand Billboard This is the #1 benefit. A lighter is lost, packaging is thrown away, but a rolling tray *lives* on your customer's coffee table, desk, or nightstand. It's a permanent, 24/7 advertisement in their most personal space. Its large, flat surface is a true billboard, and our edge-to-edge printing allows for stunning, high-impact artwork that demands attention and starts conversations.
  • Unlock Your Highest Profit Margins Rolling trays are a "keystone" retail product. The perceived value is incredibly high. A **Classic Tin Tray** that costs you $4-$6 in bulk can easily retail for **$20-$25**. A **Magnetic Lid Tray** that costs $8-$10 can retail for **$35-$40**. A **Premium Aluminum Tray** that costs $18-$22 can retail for **$50-$60**. The margins are healthy, protected, and reliable.
  • A "Good, Better, Best" Strategy in One Place This collection gives you a complete retail strategy. You're not just selling one tray. You're capturing the **budget-conscious** customer (with the tin tray), the **practical, on-the-go** customer (with the magnetic lid tray), and the **luxury, high-end connoisseur** (with the aluminum tray). You can serve every single customer, all under your single, unified brand.
  • The Centerpiece of Your Brand "Ecosystem" The tray is the *base* for all your other branded items. It's the stage. When a customer uses *your* branded tray, they will want the matching accessories. This is your chance to sell them *your* branded grinder, *your* branded lighter, *your* branded stash jar, and *your* branded papers. It makes your products look like a complete, cohesive set.
  • Flexible MOQs & 100% Free Professional Design We are your B2B partner. We make it easy. For our in-stock, premium aluminum trays, we can offer **no minimum order quantity** for laser engraving. For high-volume, full-color printed tin trays, our MOQs are low and flexible (typically 100-250 units). Best of all, our in-house, professional design team will provide **100% free, no-obligation mockups** for you to approve.

Ready to put your brand on their coffee table?

This is the most permanent, high-margin, high-visibility branding you can buy. Click the button to request a free, no-obligation mockup and our design team will create a stunning, print-ready design for your own line of custom metal rolling trays.

Frequently Asked Questions About Custom Metal Trays

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for custom metal trays?
Our MOQs are extremely flexible. For our in-stock, premium aluminum trays, we can offer **no minimum order quantity** for laser engraving. For full-color, edge-to-edge printed tin trays and magnetic lid trays, which are a bulk-production item, a higher MOQ (typically 100-250 units) is required to set up the printing.

What's the *real* difference between the "Tin" tray and the "Aluminum" tray?
This is the most important question. A **Tin Tray** (your "good" option) is made from a thin sheet of metal, is very lightweight, and has classic, rounded, rolled edges. It's the cost-effective, high-volume standard and perfect for full-color printing. An **Aluminum Tray** (your "best" option) is CNC-milled from a *solid block* of aluminum. It's much thicker, heavier, 100% rigid, and has flat, premium-feeling edges. It is a luxury, "buy-it-for-life" product with a much higher perceived value.

How durable is the full-color printing on the tin trays? Will it scratch off?
Our full-color printing is extremely durable and designed for years of use. We use advanced **UV-cured ink** or **sublimation** processes that bond the design to the metal at a molecular level. It is **not a sticker** and will not peel. It is scratch-resistant, water-resistant, and fade-resistant for many years of regular rolling.

What is the benefit of the magnetic lid? Why is it a good upsell?
The magnetic lid is a pure "problem-solver." It instantly adds massive value by offering **privacy** (to hide contents), **portability** (you can put it in a bag), and **protection** (from dust, wind, and pet hair). For you, it **doubles your branding real estate** (a full print on the tray *and* the lid) and justifies a much higher retail price, making it a high-margin upsell.

What are my branding options: Printing vs. Laser Engraving?
It depends on the tray and your brand. **Full-Color Printing** is used on Tin, Tin+Lid, and Aluminum trays. It's for bold, vibrant, edge-to-edge, colorful artwork. **Laser Engraving** is used on our Aluminum trays (and our bamboo trays). It creates a permanent, premium, "burned-in" or "etched" logo that is subtle, tactile, and elegant. Our free mockup service can show you both!

Each model is specifically chosen for its elegant, durable construction and its perfect, smooth surface for full custom printing.

Ceramic is the ideal medium for brands that want to showcase their logo with vibrancy and class. The smooth, glazed surface is the perfect canvas for full-color, photorealistic custom printing, allowing for intricate designs and bold brand statements. Perfect for outfitting a cannabis consumption lounge, creating an upscale dispensary retail line, or as a high-end corporate gift, our custom ceramic ashtrays provide a lasting impression and justify a premium price point.

Explore Our Wholesale Ceramic Ashtray Collection

  • Ceramic Ashtrays with Lids: The perfect solution for discretion and cleanliness. The removable lid (which can also be branded) hides ash and odor, keeping a table or lounge looking pristine. It's a thoughtful, high-function item that customers love.
  • Ceramic Cigar Ashtrays: For the connoisseur. This large-format ashtray features a deep bowl and wide, oversized rests designed to accommodate premium cigars. Branding this item aligns your company with luxury, relaxation, and the high-end consumer.

The Ceramic Advantage: Why Brands Choose Our Ashtrays

  • Premium "In-Hand" Feel: Our high-end ceramic construction provides a substantial weight that doesn't slide or tip easily. It feels permanent and professional, instantly elevating brand perception.
  • Best-in-Class Full-Color Printing: The smooth, glazed finish is the perfect canvas for vibrant, multi-color, and even photorealistic logos. Your branding will be sharp, bright, and durable.
  • Lounge-Ready Durability: Ceramic is naturally heat-resistant and safe for continuous, heavy-duty use in a busy consumption lounge. The glazed surface is also non-porous and easy to wipe clean.
  • High-Margin Retail Potential: A branded ceramic ashtray has a high perceived value. Our wholesale pricing allows you to create a high-margin retail product that stands out on your shelves.

Frequently Asked Questions About Custom Ceramic Ashtrays

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for custom ceramic ashtrays?
Due to the custom printing and kiln-firing process required for durable ceramic branding, our MOQs for ceramic ashtrays typically start at 100 units. This ensures a high-quality, consistent run at a cost-effective price for you.

What is the average turnaround time?
Our standard turnaround time, which includes production and shipping, is typically 3-5 weeks *after* you have approved your final digital mockup. This can vary based on the item, order quantity, and complexity of the print.

How is my logo applied to the ceramic? Is it durable?
We use a high-adhesion, multi-color UV printing process or a ceramic decal firing process. Both are designed to be durable, vibrant, and resistant to fading and scratching from normal use. The result is a premium, permanent-feeling brand application, not a cheap sticker.

Can I print my design in full color or in multiple locations?

description:
Custom Metal Ashtrays Wholesale for Dispensaries & Brands

Equip your brand with the ultimate in durability and long-term brand exposure. Our collection features a range of metals to match your budget, aesthetic, and branding needs. This includes the premium, hefty stainless steel ashtray, the lightweight and cost-effective custom tin ashtray (perfect for full-color promos), and the sleek, modern anodized aluminum ashtray. Each offers industrial-strength performance with premium custom engraving and printing options.

Metal ashtrays provide exceptional ROI. They are the ideal solution for high-traffic environments, outdoor use (they won't break or blow away), and wholesale distribution. With permanent branding through precision laser engraving or durable, full-color printing, metal ashtrays create lasting brand impressions while withstanding heavy use in lounges, at festivals, and in retail environments. They are the "set it and forget it" branding tool.

Explore Our Wholesale Metal Ashtray Collection

  • Custom Stainless Steel Ashtrays: The premium, heavy-duty option. Made from high-grade, rust-proof stainless steel, these ashtrays have a significant weight and a high-end, industrial feel. They are perfect for upscale lounges and retail. We brand these with a permanent, crisp laser engraving that creates a subtle, professional, and indestructible logo.
  • Custom Tin Ashtrays: The lightweight, high-impact promotional choice. These round tin ashtrays are incredibly cost-effective at volume and offer a massive, flat surface that is perfect for vibrant, edge-to-edge, full-color (CMYK) printing. They are the #1 choice for high-volume event giveaways, trade shows, and large-scale promotional campaigns.
  • Custom Aluminum Ashtrays: The perfect balance of lightweight and durable. Our aluminum ashtrays are sleek, modern, and often feature anodized color finishes. They are lightweight, rust-proof, and feel substantial without the heaviness of steel. They are a perfect canvas for precision laser engraving, which reveals the raw silver aluminum underneath the colored finish.

The Metal Advantage: Perfect for High-Traffic Environments

  • Industrial-Strength Durability: Metal ashtrays are built for heavy, continuous use. They won't chip, crack, or break like ceramic or glass, making them the most reliable choice for a busy lounge.
  • Permanent Laser Engraving: Our most popular branding method for metal. Laser engraving etches your logo *into* the surface, creating a permanent mark that will never peel, fade, or scratch off. It's a premium, subtle, and indestructible branding solution.
  • Weather & Element Resistant: Metal is the ideal choice for outdoor smoking areas and patios. It's weather-resistant, (stainless steel and aluminum are rust-proof), and has enough weight to not be affected by wind.
  • Extremely Easy Maintenance: Metal surfaces are non-porous, easy to wipe clean, and can be sanitized quickly without damaging the finish, making them ideal for a commercial environment.
  • Unbeatable Long-Term ROI: A metal ashtray has a lifespan measured in years, if not decades. This delivers an exceptional return on investment through durability and long-term brand exposure, as you will not have to constantly replace them.

Ready to forge your brand in metal?

Let's get started. Click the button to request a free mockup and our design team will show you how your logo looks with a permanent laser engraving or full-color print. An account specialist will help you pick the perfect metal for your business.

Request a Free Mockup Browse All Ashtrays

Frequently Asked Questions About Custom Metal Ashtrays

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for custom metal ashtrays?
MOQs vary by model. Our stainless steel and aluminum ashtrays can often be laser-engraved with very low minimums (sometimes as low as 1 unit!). Our tin ashtrays, which are designed for high-volume, full-color printing, typically have a higher MOQ, starting around 100-250 units.

What's the difference between Laser Engraving and Printing?
**Laser Engraving** is for stainless steel and aluminum. It physically etches your logo *into* the metal, creating a permanent, one-color (silver) mark. It is indestructible. **Full-Color Printing** (used on our tin ashtrays) applies a durable layer of ink *onto* the surface, allowing for vibrant, multi-color logos and edge-to-edge artwork.

What is the average turnaround time?
Our low-minimum, laser-engraved items often ship in just 1-3 business days. For larger bulk orders or full-color printed tin ashtrays, the standard turnaround time (including production and shipping) is typically 3-5 weeks after you approve your final design mockup.

Are these ashtrays truly suitable for outdoor use?
Yes. This is what they are built for. Stainless steel and aluminum are naturally rust-proof and corrosion-resistant. All our metal ashtrays are weather-resistant and have enough weight to not be easily blown away, making them perfect for outdoor patios and festival environments.

How do I clean and maintain a metal ashtray?
Metal ashtrays are the easiest to clean. They are non-porous and can be simply wiped out. For a deeper clean, they can be washed with soap and water and will not be damaged. They are dishwasher-safe, though we recommend hand-washing to preserve the finish, especially on printed tin models.

name: Standard Grinders
description:
Standard Grinders Wholesale for Dispensaries - The Core Product Line

This is the foundation of your entire accessory program. Our wholesale standard grinders collection represents the "must-have" workhorses of the cannabis industry—the essential, high-turnover products that every single dispensary needs. These are the reliable, time-tested grinders that customers know, trust, and buy every single day. They form the backbone of your retail operation, delivering consistent sales and daily brand exposure.

Our collection is curated to be your complete "good, better, best" solution. It includes the industry-leading 4-piece aluminum grinders, the heavy-duty zinc grinders, the sleek and modern matte grinders, and the high-volume 2-piece grinders. We offer these in all the most popular sizes—including 40mm (pocket/travel), 55mm (the all-arounder), and 63mm (the "home" grinder)—to ensure you can serve every customer preference.

Standard grinders are your primary tool for building brand recognition. At competitive B2B price points, these products are perfect for branding with your dispensary logo via permanent laser engraving or vibrant UV printing. They become powerful, long-lasting marketing pieces that generate reliable revenue streams while establishing your dispensary as a trusted source for quality cannabis accessories.

Explore Our Core Grinder Collection

  • 4-Piece Aluminum Grinders: The #1 Bestseller. This is the industry-standard and the core of any grinder program. Made from lightweight, durable, and rust-proof anodized aluminum, it's the perfect balance of price, performance, and quality. Its smooth surface is the ideal canvas for crisp, permanent laser engraving. Stocking this in 55mm and 63mm is essential.
  • 4-Piece Zinc Grinders: The "Heavyweight" Value. Zinc alloy is significantly heavier and denser than aluminum, giving it a substantial, premium "in-hand" feel that customers love. It's the perfect "step-up" product from aluminum, allowing you to offer a "good" and "better" option at a slightly higher margin.
  • Matte-Coated Grinders: The Modern Aesthetic. For the brand that wants a sleek, modern, and fingerprint-resistant finish. The matte coating feels premium and provides the perfect, high-adhesion surface for vibrant, **Full-Color UV Printing**. This is the grinder you choose when your brand has a colorful, intricate logo that needs to pop.
  • 2-Piece Grinders (Aluminum): The High-Volume Promo King. This is your ultimate tool for high-volume promotions and "Gift With Purchase" (GWP) campaigns. Its simple, unbreakable design and low cost-per-unit make it the perfect, affordable branded item to include in welcome kits or as a low-cost retail entry point.

Why Every Dispensary Needs Standard Grinders

  • Maximize Margins with Volume Pricing: These are your high-volume staples. Our B2B wholesale pricing is tiered, meaning the more you order, the better your price. This allows you to build a core product line with healthy, protected profit margins.
  • Proven Reliability Builds Brand Trust: These time-tested, simple designs *work*. They don't jam, break, or cross-thread easily. A reliable grinder reflects positively on the dispensary that sold it, building customer trust in your brand.
  • A Size for Every Customer & Use Case: Stocking multiple sizes isn't optional—it's smart retail. The **40mm** is the "travel" grinder for the on-the-go user. The **55mm** is the "daily driver" all-arounder. The **63mm** is the "at-home" grinder with a larger capacity. This lets you upsell customers and meet every need.
  • The Perfect Canvas for Your Brand: These grinders are designed for customization. **Precision Laser Engraving** (on aluminum/zinc) creates a permanent, premium, and subtle brand. **Full-Color UV Printing** (on matte) creates a bold, vibrant, and eye-catching logo.
  • High-Turnover, Fast-Selling Staples: These are the "bread and butter" products that will be your most consistent sellers. They have constant, proven demand, ensuring a high turnover rate and a reliable revenue stream for your accessory category.

Ready to build the foundation of your accessory line?

Let's get your brand on the most essential tool in the industry. Click the button to request a free, no-obligation mockup and our design team will show you how your logo looks on these best-selling grinders.

Request a Free Mockup Browse All Grinders

Frequently Asked Questions About Standard Grinders

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for standard grinders?
This is one of our biggest advantages. For our most popular 4-piece aluminum grinders, we offer **No Minimum Order Quantity** for laser engraving. For zinc, matte, and printed grinders, MOQs are still low and flexible, typically starting around 100 units.

What's the real difference between an Aluminum and a Zinc grinder?
The main difference is **weight and perceived value**. Aluminum is lightweight, durable, and cost-effective. Zinc Alloy is much heavier and denser, which gives it a substantial, "premium" feel in the hand. This allows you to position the zinc grinder as a "step-up" product at a higher price point.

Which branding is better: Laser Engraving or UV Printing?
It depends on your logo. **Laser Engraving** is best for a permanent, subtle, and premium one-color (silver) look. It's indestructible. **Full-Color UV Printing** (perfect for our matte grinders) is for brands with a bold, colorful, or intricate logo that needs to be seen.

Why should my dispensary offer multiple grinder sizes (40mm, 55mm, 63mm)?
It's a smart retail strategy. The **40mm** is a low-cost, portable "travel" grinder. The **55mm** is the "standard" all-arounder that appeals to most people. The **63mm** is the "at-home" grinder with a larger capacity, which you can sell as a premium upsell. Offering all three lets you serve every customer and price point.

What's the difference in retail strategy between a 2-piece and a 4-piece grinder?
The **4-piece grinder** is your main retail "product." It has high-value features (kief catcher, storage) that justify a higher retail price and better margins. The **2-piece grinder** is your main "promotional" tool. Its low cost makes it the perfect, high-volume item for "Gift With Purchase" campaigns to increase average order value.

Wholesale Cannabis Promotional Items & Branded Accessories

In a crowded market with strict advertising regulations, the battle for brand recognition is won through physical, tangible touchpoints. Think of these items as your "business card 2.0"—a business card your customers will never throw away. A custom-branded matchbook isn't just a light; it's a brand impression every time it's struck. A custom cone loader isn't just a freebie; it's a "thank you" that gets used and appreciated weekly, reinforcing your store as a helpful resource. These aren't disposable throwaways; they are "lifestyle" items that integrate your brand into your customer's daily ritual. This collection is the perfect solution for event giveaways, trade show "swag," high-margin point-of-sale (POS) upsells, and "gift with purchase" (GWP) incentives.

Explore Our Core Promotional Accessories

We've built our promotional collection around items that deliver the highest utility at the lowest possible cost-per-impression. Each is a blank canvas for your brand.

Custom Cone Loaders

The perfect companion for the "roll your own" (RYO) customer. This simple, brilliant, and affordable tool simplifies the often-messy process of filling pre-rolled cones. Our custom cone loaders are a game-changer for your customers, and a massive opportunity for your brand. The large, flat surface is a perfect billboard for your logo, a QR code, or your social media handle. They are an ideal item to bundle with branded rolling papers or as a gift with any flower purchase, ensuring your customer has a positive, helpful tool associated directly with your brand.

Custom Branded Matchbooks & Matchboxes

The original, and still undefeated, promotional item. There is a classic, authentic, and "retro" feel to a branded match that digital marketing can't replicate. Our custom-branded matchbooks and custom-branded matchboxes offer a timeless, tactile, and incredibly cost-effective way to get your brand out into the world. They are perfect for placing in "giveaway bowls" at your budtender stations, including in every exit bag, or distributing at local events and concerts. With full-color printing available, you can transform this simple utility into a pocket-sized piece of art.

The B2B Advantage: Why Invest in Promotional Items?

Our program is built to generate a clear return on investment for your dispensary or brand. Here’s why it works.

  • The Lowest Cost-Per-Impression: A single, high-volume order of custom matchbooks can result in thousands of physical brand impressions for a fraction of the cost of a single digital ad campaign.
  • High Utility = "Sticky" Marketing: Unlike a flyer, our items are *useful*. A customer will keep a cone loader or a box of matches for weeks or months, reinforcing your brand with every use.
  • Increase Average Order Value (AOV): Use these items as a "Gift With Purchase" (GWP) incentive. A simple "Spend $75 and get a free branded cone loader" is a proven strategy to increase basket size.
  • Offline, Event & Guerilla Marketing: These items are perfect for trade shows, grand openings, and local events. They are a physical, compliant way to spread your brand name throughout the community.
  • Full Customization & Free Design Support: Don't have a design? No problem. Our in-house graphics team will create a stunning, 100% free, no-obligation mockup of your logo on any of these products.
  • High-Margin Upsell Potential: While great as giveaways, these items are also perfect for a low-cost, high-margin retail "add-on" section near your POS.

Stop spending your marketing budget on ads that disappear. Invest in physical, tangible marketing that your customers will hold, use, and appreciate. Contact us today to speak with an account executive and get your free, no-obligation design mockups started.

Frequently Asked Questions about Promotional Items

Here are answers to our most common questions about our wholesale promotional items.

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for promotional items?
MOQs for promotional items like matchbooks, matchboxes, and cone loaders are typically higher than for other products because they are high-volume, low-cost items produced in bulk. MOQs generally start from 500 to 2,500 units, depending on the specific item and customization. This ensures the lowest possible cost-per-item for you.

What is the average turnaround time for these items?
Because these are fully custom-printed and produced in large quantities, the standard turnaround time is typically 4-6 weeks after you approve your final design mockup. We recommend planning your event or promotional orders in advance.

What's the difference between a custom matchbook and a custom matchbox?
A **matchbook** (like this one) is the classic style with a cardboard flap that folds over and is stapled at the bottom. A **matchbox** (like this one) features a slide-out inner tray that holds the matches. Both offer excellent, full-color branding opportunities on all sides.

What kind of customization can I do on a cone loader?
The custom cone loader is essentially a flat, card-like tool. This provides a large, flat surface on both the front and back for full-color, edge-to-edge printing. It's perfect for your logo, social media handles, a QR code, or even simple "how-to" instructions.

Can you help me with the design? I just have a logo.
Absolutely. This is a core part of our service. Send our in-house design team your logo (a vector file like .AI or .EPS is best) and any other information you want to include. We will create a professional, free mockup for you to review and approve before any production begins.

name: Metal Stash Jars
description:
Custom Metal Stash Jars Wholesale for Dispensaries & Cannabis Retailers

The "Go-Anywhere," Indestructible Storage Solution for Your Customer's Active Life

A glass stash jar is beautiful on a coffee table. A metal stash jar is essential for *everywhere else*. Our wholesale metal stash jars collection is the ultimate B2B solution for dispensaries serving customers who live an active, "on-the-go" lifestyle. This is the "peace of mind" product. Our collection is built to provide a durable, portable solution for every need. Each is fully brandable, most with our signature permanent laser engraving.

Metal stash jars are a high-margin, problem-solving upsell. They provide unbeatable durability and portability, keeping your dispensary brand visible wherever your customers go. The laser-engraved branding is as permanent as the product itself—it will never fade, peel, or scratch off. You're not just selling a jar; you're selling a "buy-it-for-life" piece of branded hardware.

Explore Our "On-the-Go" Metal Storage Collection

We offer two primary solutions: a "daily-carry" pocket item and a "backpack-ready" bulk container. Both are available with our flexible, "No Minimum" customization.

1. The "Daily Carry" / Promo Tool: Mini Keychain Stash Jars

This is your most powerful, low-cost "sticky" promotional item. It's a "must-have" for your loyalty program or as a "Gift With Purchase" (GWP). This small, discreet, and airtight aluminum jar attaches directly to your customer's keys. This means your brand is in their hand, pocket, or purse every single day. The ROI in terms of daily brand impressions is unmatched. It's a "no-brainer" giveaway that provides genuine, daily-use value. And with our No-Minimum program, you can order 10 or 10,000.

2. The "Backpack" / Workhorse: Aluminum Herb Containers

This is your core retail product. It's the high-margin upsell for the active customer. Made from high-grade, CNC-milled aluminum, this jar is lightweight but incredibly strong. It's designed to be the "travel jar," holding an eighth or a quarter perfectly and securely. The fine-threaded, airtight, and smell-proof seal protects flower from being crushed or drying out. It's the perfect, durable companion for travel, hiking, concerts, or just throwing in a bag. The smooth metal surface is the ideal canvas for a clean, premium, permanent laser-engraved logo.

The B2B Advantage: Why Metal Jars are a High-Margin, "No-Brainer" Upsell

  • 1. Sell "Peace of Mind" (Extreme Durability) This is the key selling point. You are selling "peace of mind" to the customer who is tired of broken glass or crushed pre-rolls. These containers are CNC-milled from solid aluminum. They are crush-proof, drop-proof, and impact-resistant. This is the product you sell to the active consumer, and its durability justifies a high-margin, premium price.
  • 2. Branding That Lasts as Long as the Product (Permanent Laser Engraving) This is a massive differentiator. A printed logo on a pouch can scratch off in a backpack. A sticker will peel. Laser Engraving is permanent. It physically *etches* your logo into the metal. It will never fade, peel, or scratch off. Your brand identity is now as rugged and "buy-it-for-life" as the product itself.
  • 3. The Perfect "Active Lifestyle" Upsell This product gives your budtenders a powerful, targeted sales tool. When a customer mentions they are "going camping" or "heading to a festival," this is the perfect, logical upsell. "You should grab one of our indestructible, branded travel jars." It's a high-margin, problem-solving item that shows you understand your customer's lifestyle.
  • 4. Airtight, Smell-Proof, & Pocket-Friendly It's not just durable; it's functional. The high-quality gaskets and fine machine-threading create a 100% airtight and smell-proof seal. This locks in freshness, protects terpenes, and provides total discretion for the user. It's the professional, polite, and secure way for your customers to travel with their product.
  • 5. "No Minimum" Flexibility for Your Business Want to test this product? You don't need to buy 1,000. Many of our metal stash jars are part of our "No Minimum" program. This means you can order *one* custom-engraved jar as a sample. You can order *20* for a small display. This gives you zero financial risk and maximum agility.

Ready to offer your customers an indestructible solution?

Let's create a functional, high-margin accessory that's as durable as your brand. Click the button to request a free, no-obligation mockup and our design team will show you how your logo looks with a permanent, premium laser engraving.

Request a Free Mockup Browse All Stash Jars

Frequently Asked Questions About Custom Metal Stash Jars

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for metal jars?
This is our biggest advantage. For many of our in-stock aluminum and keychain jars, we offer **no minimum order quantity** for laser engraving. You can order one to test, or 100 for a small batch.

What's the best branding method for metal? Is it permanent?
Laser Engraving is the #1 and most recommended method. It is 100% permanent. It's not a print or a sticker; it physically *etches* your logo into the metal's surface. It will never peel, fade, or scratch off, even in a backpack full of keys. For some models, we also offer durable UV printing for full-color logos.

Are these jars *really* airtight and smell-proof?
Yes. They are specifically engineered for this. Our metal jars feature high-quality rubber O-rings or silicone gaskets in the lids, which create a 100% airtight and waterproof seal when screwed shut. This locks in freshness and, most importantly, locks in all odors.

Why should I stock metal jars *and* glass jars?
They serve two different customers. You stock **Glass Jars** for the "at-home connoisseur"—the customer who values purity, terpene preservation, and seeing their flower. You stock **Metal Jars** for the "on-the-go user"—the customer who values durability, portability, and discretion. You need both to serve your full customer base.

What is the benefit of the "keychain" stash jar?
The keychain jar is your ultimate "sticky" promotional tool. It's a low-cost, high-value giveaway that solves a real problem (on-the-go storage for a single joint or a small amount of flower). Because it attaches to your customer's keys, your brand is guaranteed to be in their pocket or purse every single day. It's the highest-frequency marketing you can buy.

name: ROCA™ Custom Wraps
description:

Built on a foundation of **100% natural, unbleached hemp**, these wraps are engineered for a perfect smoke. They feature an **engineered honeycomb texture** for superior airflow and a **self-correcting burn pattern** that virtually eliminates canoeing. Every puff is smooth, even, and flavorful, reinforcing your dispensary’s commitment to quality. We print your brand directly on the wrap and the packaging using safe, vibrant **soy-based natural inks**, transforming an everyday smoke into a memorable, branded experience that your customers will seek out again and again.

Explore the ROCA™ Technology Advantage

This is more than just a wrap; it's a piece of engineering. The features below are what justify a premium price point and what will keep your customers coming back for more.

1. 100% Natural Hemp Paper

The foundation of a premium smoke is a clean, natural paper. Our wraps are made from 100% natural, unbleached hemp, free from chalk, bleach, and chemical additives. This ensures a slow, even burn and a pure, untainted flavor profile that *complements* your flower, rather than covering it up with a harsh paper taste.

2. Engineered Honeycomb Airflow Texture

This is the visible difference. The wrap is embossed with ROCA’s proprietary honeycomb micro-pattern. This texture isn't just for looks; it's an advanced airflow system. It creates micro-channels that ensure a smoother, more effortless pull and help regulate the burn rate, making it incredibly easy to roll and smoke.

3. Self-Correcting, Anti-Canoe Design

"Canoeing" or "running" is the #1 complaint with generic wraps. The ROCA™ innovative microstructure and honeycomb pattern work together to create a **self-correcting burn**. If one side starts to burn faster, the textured pattern automatically slows it down, encouraging the wrap to burn evenly from start to finish. This is a massive, functional benefit that your customers will notice and appreciate.

4. Vibrant, Food-Safe Soy-Based Inks

Your brand should be bold, but also safe. We print your logo or custom "step-and-repeat" pattern directly *onto the hemp wrap itself* using **100% safe, food-grade, soy-based natural inks**. This allows for crisp, vibrant branding with complete eco-integrity. It's an "Instagrammable" product that's completely safe to consume.

5. Premium Tip & Flavor Variety

Cater to every customer preference. You can choose to include premium **glass tips** (for the ultimate connoisseur experience) or classic **paper filter tips**. We also offer a variety of flavor profiles, from natural hemp to subtle, terpene-infused fruit notes, allowing you to create a complete product line that matches your store’s personality.

  • 1. Unlock "Top-Shelf" Positioning & Fatter Margins This is a "halo product." You cannot compete with the smoke shop down the street on the price of generic wraps. Stop trying. By creating a premium, exclusive, custom-branded ROCA™ Wrap, you **exit the commodity market**. This is a premium product that justifies a premium retail price, allowing you to enjoy significantly healthier profit margins.
  • 2. Drive Powerful, Lasting Customer Loyalty These wraps are a high-velocity, consumable product that builds a powerful loyalty loop. When a customer falls in love with the smooth, even-burning experience of *your* branded wrap, they are **forced to return to your dispensary** to buy it again. You have created an exclusive product that *only you sell*.
  • 3. A 360-Degree Branding Powerhouse Every component is a marketing touchpoint. Your logo is on the **fully-printed retail packaging**. Your logo is printed **directly on the wrap itself**. Your logo can even be on the **filter tip**. Every time a customer buys, rolls, or shares your wrap, they are interacting with your brand. It's a "pocket billboard" that gets passed around a session, generating organic, word-of-mouth marketing.
  • 4. Free Professional Design & Retail-Ready Packaging We make it easy. Our in-house design team will provide **free, professional branded mockups** of your wrap and your packaging. Your product arrives at your door 100% retail-ready—no extra labeling, no extra work. Just open the display box and put it on the counter.

Ready to create your own premium, high-margin wrap?

Frequently Asked Questions About Custom ROCA™ Wraps

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for these wraps?
Because ROCA™ Wraps are a highly specialized, custom-manufactured product, the MOQ is required to set up the custom printing plates and production line. MOQs generally start in the **1,000 to 2,500 unit (packs) range**, which ensures the lowest possible cost-per-unit for your retail line.

What is the average turnaround time?
Our standard turnaround time for custom ROCA™ Wraps, which includes full-color printing (on packaging and wrap), manufacturing, and shipping, is typically **4-6 weeks** *after* you have approved your final digital mockup.

What's the difference between a ROCA™ Wrap and a generic blunt wrap?
**Technology and Quality.** A generic wrap is often just thick, processed paper, which leads to canoeing, a harsh taste, and an inconsistent experience. A ROCA™ Wrap is an *engineered* product made from 100% natural hemp, featuring the Honeycomb Texture and Anti-Canoe design for a guaranteed smooth, even burn. You are selling a premium, consistent *experience*, not a commodity.

Are the soy inks and flavors safe to smoke?
Yes, 100%. This is a core part of the product. The inks used for printing directly on the wrap are **100% food-grade, non-toxic, and soy-based**. They are designed to be safe for consumption and are tasteless. Any added flavors are also food-grade and tested for safety and purity.

What is the benefit of a glass tip vs. a paper tip?
It's a premium upsell. A **paper tip** is a standard, functional filter. A **glass tip** is a high-end, reusable, connoisseur accessory. It provides a cooler smoke, has a premium "in-hand" feel, and is fully washable. Offering a glass tip option (either included or as a separate upsell) instantly positions your wrap in the "luxury" category and justifies a higher price.

What are my customization options?
You can customize *everything*. We offer **full-color, edge-to-edge printing** on the entire retail package (e.g., the pouch or box). We offer **1-color or multi-color printing** of your logo or pattern directly *onto the wrap itself*. And we can brand the **filter tip** (both paper and glass) with your logo. Our design team will provide free mockups of all these components.
