name: Custom Apparel
description:
Custom Branded Apparel for Dispensaries & Brands

Turn your customers and staff into your most powerful marketing asset. Our Custom Branded Apparel collection is the ultimate B2B solution for dispensaries, cultivators, and cannabis brands looking to build a loyal "tribe," professionalize their team, and create a high-margin retail revenue stream. We build apparel people actually want to wear.

Our core collection focuses on the three most in-demand items: premium custom t-shirts, cozy fleece hoodies, and stylish baseball hats. Every piece is a blank canvas, ready to showcase your logo, event artwork, or brand message with high-quality, durable decoration methods that last wash after wash.

Whether you're outfitting your budtender team with professional staff uniforms, creating a limited-edition merch drop for a new product launch, or stocking up on event swag, we make the process painless. Our B2B platform is built for speed: choose your product, upload your art, and our in-house team will send a free, professional mockup for you to review and approve.

Explore Our Core Apparel Collection

  • Custom T-Shirts: The essential building block. We start with trusted, high-quality "workhorse" brands like Gildan, offering a fantastic balance of comfort, durability, and value. They are the perfect canvas for vibrant, full-color screen printing or clean, professional embroidery. Ideal for staff uniforms, promotional giveaways, and everyday retail.
  • Custom Fleece Hoodies: The premium, high-value fan favorite. Our cozy, durable fleece hoodies are what your customers will live in and what your staff will love to wear. They make for a high-margin retail product and a beloved "thank you" gift for your team. We offer durable printing and high-end embroidery to make your brand look its best.
  • Custom Baseball Hats: The #1 high-impact wearable accessory. A well-made custom hat is a walking billboard. We offer a range of styles and specialize in premium decoration methods, including 3D "puff" embroidery and custom patches, to create a retail-quality piece of headwear that gets seen everywhere.

The MunchMakers B2B Apparel Advantage

  • Low MOQs & Scalable Solutions: Our flexible order sizes are perfect for everyone. Test a new design with a small, affordable run, or scale up for a multi-state operation. We're built to grow with you.
  • Free, Professional Design Support: Our in-house team provides fast, 100% free digital mockups. You'll see *exactly* how your apparel will look and can approve production with total confidence.
  • Premium Decoration Methods: We've mastered the best decoration methods—from vibrant, long-lasting screen printing to high-end 3D puff embroidery and custom patches—to perfectly match your creative vision and budget.
  • Retail-Ready Quality Assurance: We have a rigorous quality control process. Every run is checked to ensure your finished product is polished, professional, and ready for your retail shelves or your staff's backs.

Ready to see your brand in wearable form?

Let's get started. Click the button to request a free mockup and one of our apparel specialists will help you pick the best product and decoration method for your budget, timeline, and brand impact.

Request a Free Mockup Browse All Apparel

Note: This category will expand over time with new apparel items and decoration options. If you have a special request for an item you don't see here (like lanyards, beanies, or different apparel brands), contact our team! We have a dedicated sourcing department and will be happy to advise on artwork, sizing, and lead times.

Frequently Asked Questions About Custom Apparel

What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for custom apparel?
Our MOQs are designed to be flexible. They vary depending on the product and the customization method. For example, a complex, multi-color screen-printed t-shirt order may require a 100-unit minimum, while we can often accommodate smaller, simpler orders. We're built to support both small test runs and large-scale production.

What is the average turnaround time for custom apparel?
Standard turnaround time, which includes production and shipping, is typically 3-5 weeks *after* you have approved your final digital mockup. This can vary based on the item, order quantity, and complexity of the decoration. We also offer rush services for an additional fee if you have a tight deadline.

What kind of artwork file do I need to provide?
For the best, high-quality results, our design team strongly prefers a **vector file** (such as .AI, .EPS, or .PDF). Vector files can be scaled to any size (from a small hat logo to a large hoodie back) without losing quality. If you only have a raster file (like a high-resolution .PNG or .JPG), send it over, and our team will work with you to vectorize it for production.

Can I mix and match sizes and colors in my order?
Absolutely. You can mix and match apparel sizes (e.g., S, M, L, XL) within your order to get the right breakdown for your team or customers. You can often mix apparel colors as well, as long as the logo/design being printed or embroidered is the same for all items.

What's the difference between screen printing and embroidery?
**Screen Printing** (or DTG - Direct-to-Garment printing) is a process that applies layers of ink to the fabric. It's perfect for larger designs, multi-color or photorealistic graphics, and is the standard for T-shirts and hoodies. **Embroidery** is a process that stitches your design into the fabric with thread. It has a high-end, textured, professional feel and is the standard for hats, polos, and premium hoodies.
